data.what_is:
Omnisend is an email & SMS marketing platform with a suite of features made specifically to help ecommerce stores grow their online businesses faster. One-click integration with major ecommerce platforms, pre-made automation & email templates, and award-winning 24/7/365 live customer support make it easy for brands of any size to sell more--all without the exaggerated cost.

Join more than 100,000 ecommerce brands that use Omnisend to grow their businesses on autopilot, converting their customers with quick-to-build, highly-relevant emails & texts. 

- Send newsletters and targeted campaigns

Create beautiful, shoppable emails in minutes using our drag & drop email builder and a variety of ready-made email templates. Add coupon codes, automatically pick & insert products and automatically resend campaigns to the non-openers - all without any tedious manual work! 

- Drive sales on autopilot with ecommerce automations

Win (back) lost sales with pre-built workflows for cart abandonment, welcome series, transactional emails and more. Get pre-built, revenue-generating automations running in minutes or easily build your custom workflows using our no-code, drag & drop Automations Editor. 

- Improve your targeting with robust segmentation

Segment your customers based on their shopping behavior as well as other properties to improve conversions with well-targeted, personalized emails and texts. Create segments for high-value customers, for specific category/product shoppers or those that need to be reengaged and personalize your messaging. 

- Combine email with SMS and more channels

Add SMS and push notifications right next to your emails using the same platform and provide a consistent, omnichannel customer experience. Save time and costs - there's no need to pay for separate email, SMS, and push apps anymore!

- Build your email & SMS lists

Collect new subscribers using our mobile-friendly, fully customizable forms. Choose from popups, signup boxes, landing pages, or a wheel of fortune to seamlessly collect email and/or SMS opt-ins. Capture your visitors with exit-intent forms and improve popup engagement using form targeting options, all available within Omnisend.

- 24/7 Support

We give you stellar support and helpful advice anytime you need it. We're available 24/7.

Start using Omnisend for free, upgrade anytime!

Omnisend invites Freelancers and Agencies to join the Omnisend partner program. This program is created to help Freelancers and Agencies accelerate their growth, win more clients and receive industry leading revenue share for referred and managed accounts. Check the link and join the program: https://www.omnisend.com/partners/
data.product_description:
Discover how Omnisend empowers ecommerce marketers to turn visitors into 
customers with segmentation, automation and omnichannel features.

pricing_plans.plan_description: Best for starting businesses or for exploring Omnisend
plan_features: Up to 60 international SMS & 500 Web Push

pricing_plans.plan_description: Best for growing and medium-sized businesses focused on email marketing
Best for high-volume senders aimed at adding extra power with SMS
plan_features: Unlimited emails and Web Push notifications

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 225 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 202 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 171 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 253 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 237 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 127 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 171 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 143 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 241 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 163 Omnisend reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Multiple Domains

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend's UX is the best and I have used/paid for Klaviyo, Mailchimp. The email editor/designer is fluid and it's delightful to add the elements, save layouts, etc.

The pricing is customer (SMB) friendly.

The in-built templates for form and automation workflows are high-quality and aesthetically pleasing.

I ripped and replaced Klaviyo - the switching cost was negligible as the implementation was a breeze. I actually saved time and energy from not having to scream at some of the bugs Klaviyo has.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
My GIF attachments in the emails don't take full space on the screen which used to be the case w/ Shopify's native ESP and I miss that look and feel.

I'm using/paying for PostScript for my SMS marketing and wish there was a magic button to transfer my workflows automatically. I haven't done the cost comparison or how much of a different Omnisend will have but I might experiment to see if there's any difference and then switch over. Also, don't know how can I port all my SMS numbers that subscribed on PostScript over to Omnisend.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Full cycle website visitor conversion (lead gen) and email marketing for our Shopify brand (toughtrucksforkids.com).

I ripped and replaced Klaviyo - the switching cost was negligible as the implementation was a breeze. I actually saved time and energy from not having to scream at some of the bugs Klaviyo has.

I haven't done the cost comparison or how much of a different Omnisend will have but I might experiment to see if there's any difference and then switch over. initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
If you're looking for something that's just plain better than MailChimp, Omnisend is the way to go. It's really flexible and you can build beautiful marketing emails quickly and easily. There are a ton of nice templates built in and it looks like they're always adding more and creating ones specific to the season or upcoming holiday. It's been super easy to adapt our old email templates into Omnisend and save custom blocks/layouts.

Additionally, Omnisend's customer support has been great. We've had two minor issues and both times Omnisend has helped solve those problems swiftly. Props to Karine on the Omnisend support team for her help.

Omnisend's integration with our Wordpress site has also proven to be an unexpected and welcome additional value. It is highly insightful for us to get a better idea of what our members are viewing on our site. This is a tool similar to what you'll find in Hubspot but at a fraction of the price.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
So far, the only thing I've really disliked with Omnisend is the simplicity of the text block. It would be really nice to have an HTML-editing option so that I can place non-breaking spaces or similar characters without having to copy them from an ASCII table.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been using MailChimp and felt stymied by both Mailchimp's higher cost and lack of customization. Plus, MailChimp's code seems to have a lot of issues with newer versions of Outlook, or whenever someone forwards an email. Omnisend costs less and looks better. And emails look great across more platforms and have fewer issues when forwarded.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
really easy to use dashboard, lots of pre-made templates, really easy and friendly customer support, integrates well with most of our applications. we use this everyday because of its automation features and it was really easy to set it all up.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
there are a few features that we have had to find work around for, which are specific for our business needs. support have been amazing though and given us all the relevant information and suggestions for alternative options.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
having a well-designed and optimised automation flow is essential for our business. this helps with new customers all the way through to nurturing our existing customers, up-selling and more. the integration is seamless with out wordpress/woocommerce website and the forms are all designed and managed within Omnisend platform - which for me is much better and way less clunky than having it on site.

Additionally, their support team is always available and genuinely dedicated to finding solutions to any problems you might encounter. i use it for shopify  and it seems to work fine, as a dropshipper this is a nice solution for basic and advanced campaign

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I love using Omnisend because it's affordable and very easy to use but also powerful enough to let me create any kind of marketing campaigns I can think of - including the forms I need to go with those campaigns. This means I can get really creative with my ideas and easily put them into action, all in one place. It's a great tool for reaching out to people in the way I want.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I wish there were more training materials. For example, I can't see how to place my own social media links in the social media icons for email. Also, I wanted to put a "banner" in one of my emails to get people to click on it to opt-in for text messaging. I found a workaround, but it would have been simpler if that had been an option .

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Affordable marketing automation that integrates easily with BigCommerce. We moved away from WooCommerce and Mailchimp- this is so much more fluid and easy.

initial_reviews.review_title: Omnisend was a nightmare for me.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like the design and the multistep form

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Workflow only work for new subscribers added after the workflow was created, which is nonsensical. Old subscribers from the same segment do not receive messages at all

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I created the following workflow: if the trigger "previous email with the particular subject was sent" and a certain delay has passed, then send email 1 to the segment.

However, this workflow only works for new subscribers added after the workflow was created, which is nonsensical.

Moreover, if I edit this workflow and add a new email that should be sent after some delay following the previous email, it also does not work for new subscribers! It's frustrating that you can't simply send emails to your segment.

I asked the customer support team for help, but they sent many letters with completely incompetent advice. For example, they said that each time I need to create new campaigns (not workflows) for old subscribers. They did not mention that these campaigns would be sent to both old and new subscribers who had already received similar emails.

Now you know why I cancelled the subscription.

initial_reviews.review_title: Omnisend is the easiest, most seamless newsletter platform I have used.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The ease of linking products from our site. It is super simple to add products and choose the photo of the item you wish to display. This makes creating newsletters for our a quick process.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There was an issue once in the past when domain authentication was required. I was confused so I emailed customer support in hopes that I would be able to speak with someone on the phone who could walk me through the process. Unfortunately that wasn't an option. I think that making calls available for users would improve the customer support aspect of Omnisend.

Another issue is on some mobile devices the newsletter format looks different than it does on a computer. The format is sometimes changed and that could potentially cause fewer sales.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Often when we send out a newsletter using Omnisend we get a bunch of online orders. Simple as that! We need to sell products and Omnisend allows us to advertise directly in our customers' inboxes.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
What stands out about Omnisend is its user-friendly design and powerful automation features. Crafting beautiful emails is a breeze with their drag-and-drop editor, and the ability to segment and personalize campaigns ensures messages hit the mark. The pre-built workflows for key customer touchpoints like cart abandonment and welcome emails are particularly valuable, automating tasks that would otherwise be time-consuming.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
However, newcomers to email marketing might find there's a bit to learn to fully leverage Omnisend's capabilities.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend streamlines my email marketing efforts, automating tasks like campaign creation and customer segmentation. This saves me time and enhances the effectiveness of my communications, leading to better engagement and increased sales.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend is a very easy to use platform and has a lot of automation options for email, SMS. You do not need to be an email marketing expert to get the hang of things. It has a great selection of template blocks to use within your campaigns and makes it super simple to create engaging emails. It's helped our email revenue dramatically. The customer support team is also super helpful when needed.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Theres not a lot to complain about. The only thing i would ideally like to see is saved exclusions as it would make the sending process quicker. Its not a huge thing, but if i could save a list of normal exclusions rather than selecting them all one by one, it would streamline things nicely.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps me create and send personalised campaigns across email, automations and SMS quickly and efficiently. The process is not time consuming and actually fun to use. It also helps provide me with  data-driven insights and optimisation.

initial_reviews.review_title: Avoid if you are using WooCommerce
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Its simple to use and has cheaper pricing then Klaviyo

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
You get what you pay for.

If you are using ecommerce and regularly test things on staging sites, avoid Omnisend at all cost. Copying your live site to staging with omnisend plugin turned on, risks your URL getting overwritten with the staging URL, breaking automations.

they can't tell you what broke, how many customers got a bad email, and they have no need to fix it. You must
- Turn off your Omnisend plugin
- Copy live to staging (or making a new staging)
- Turn it back on on the live site
- Delet ethe plugin from the staging site.
-add it back on to the stagign site.
- connect it to a free account.

You have to do this EACH time you copy live to staging. Enjoy! We would have went with Klaviyo if we knew this.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Causing more problems then sovling them ATM.

Otherwise it send campaigns, should send transactional emails but those are very complicated to set up and they don't have basic templates for WooCommerce liek failed order reminders.

review_question_answers.answer: Its simple to use and has cheaper pricing then Klaviyo

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Omnisend?

You get what you pay for.

If you are using ecommerce and regularly test things on staging sites, avoid Omnisend at all cost. Copying your live site to staging with omnisend plugin turned on, risks your URL getting overwritten with the staging URL, breaking automations.

they can't tell you what broke, how many customers got a bad email, and they have no need to fix it. You must
- Turn off your Omnisend plugin
- Copy live to staging (or making a new staging)
- Turn it back on on the live site
- Delet ethe plugin from the staging site.
-add it back on to the stagign site.
- connect it to a free account.

You have to do this EACH time you copy live to staging. Enjoy! We would have went with Klaviyo if we knew this.

initial_reviews.review_title: Ideal for small businesses and brilliant customer service
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Overall it is quite simple to use, we like the click map feature in the Report section. The drag and drop feature is really easy to use and the pre-built sections are so handy. The customer service is excellent with replies usually within 5 minutes. We found the pricing to be quite reasonable compared to other Shopify integrated apps.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Some aspects of the interface are quite limited, for example we feel it is missing segment based reports (currently we have to duplicate campaigns to send to different segments to get accurate reporting). It also does not update tags in Shopify for customers if you edit the tags directly in Omnisend. When you ask customer service about these issues they seem receptive to feedback and requests - we're yet to see if any feedback has been acted on though.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing with more in-depth analysis and content sections than the basic Shopify email.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend's UX is the best and I have used/paid for Klaviyo, Mailchimp. The email editor/designer is fluid and it's delightful to add the elements, save layouts, etc.

The pricing is customer (SMB) friendly.

The in-built templates for form and automation workflows are high-quality and aesthetically pleasing.

I ripped and replaced Klaviyo - the switching cost was negligible as the implementation was a breeze. I actually saved time and energy from not having to scream at some of the bugs Klaviyo has.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
My GIF attachments in the emails don't take full space on the screen which used to be the case w/ Shopify's native ESP and I miss that look and feel.

I'm using/paying for PostScript for my SMS marketing and wish there was a magic button to transfer my workflows automatically. I haven't done the cost comparison or how much of a different Omnisend will have but I might experiment to see if there's any difference and then switch over. Also, don't know how can I port all my SMS numbers that subscribed on PostScript over to Omnisend.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Full cycle website visitor conversion (lead gen) and email marketing for our Shopify brand (toughtrucksforkids.com).

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
If you're looking for something that's just plain better than MailChimp, Omnisend is the way to go. It's really flexible and you can build beautiful marketing emails quickly and easily. There are a ton of nice templates built in and it looks like they're always adding more and creating ones specific to the season or upcoming holiday. It's been super easy to adapt our old email templates into Omnisend and save custom blocks/layouts.

Additionally, Omnisend's customer support has been great. We've had two minor issues and both times Omnisend has helped solve those problems swiftly. Props to Karine on the Omnisend support team for her help.

Omnisend's integration with our Wordpress site has also proven to be an unexpected and welcome additional value. It is highly insightful for us to get a better idea of what our members are viewing on our site. This is a tool similar to what you'll find in Hubspot but at a fraction of the price.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
So far, the only thing I've really disliked with Omnisend is the simplicity of the text block. It would be really nice to have an HTML-editing option so that I can place non-breaking spaces or similar characters without having to copy them from an ASCII table.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've been using MailChimp and felt stymied by both Mailchimp's higher cost and lack of customization. Plus, MailChimp's code seems to have a lot of issues with newer versions of Outlook, or whenever someone forwards an email. Omnisend costs less and looks better. And emails look great across more platforms and have fewer issues when forwarded.

I love using Omnisend because it's affordable and very easy to use but also powerful enough to let me create any kind of marketing campaigns I can think of - including the forms I need to go with those campaigns. This means I can get really creative with my ideas and easily put them into action, all in one place. It's a great tool for reaching out to people in the way I want.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I wish there were more training materials. For example, I can't see how to place my own social media links in the social media icons for email. Also, I wanted to put a "banner" in one of my emails to get people to click on it to opt-in for text messaging. I found a workaround, but it would have been simpler if that had been an option .

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Affordable marketing automation that integrates easily with BigCommerce. We moved away from WooCommerce and Mailchimp- this is so much more fluid and easy.

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend was a nightmare for me.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like the design and the multistep form

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Workflow only work for new subscribers added after the workflow was created, which is nonsensical. Old subscribers from the same segment do not receive messages at all

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I created the following workflow: if the trigger "previous email with the particular subject was sent" and a certain delay has passed, then send email 1 to the segment.

However, this workflow only works for new subscribers added after the workflow was created, which is nonsensical.

Moreover, if I edit this workflow and add a new email that should be sent after some delay following the previous email, it also does not work for new subscribers! It's frustrating that you can't simply send emails to your segment.

I asked the customer support team for help, but they sent many letters with completely incompetent advice. For example, they said that each time I need to create new campaigns (not workflows) for old subscribers. They did not mention that these campaigns would be sent to both old and new subscribers who had already received similar emails.

Now you know why I cancelled the subscription.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Omnisend?
review_question_answers.answer: I like the design and the multistep form

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Omnisend?
review_question_answers.answer: Workflow only work for new subscribers added after the workflow was created, which is nonsensical. Old subscribers from the same segment do not receive messages at all

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
I created the following workflow: if the trigger "previous email with the particular subject was sent" and a certain delay has passed, then send email 1 to the segment.

However, this workflow only works for new subscribers added after the workflow was created, which is nonsensical.

Moreover, if I edit this workflow and add a new email that should be sent after some delay following the previous email, it also does not work for new subscribers! It's frustrating that you can't simply send emails to your segment.

I asked the customer support team for help, but they sent many letters with completely incompetent advice. For example, they said that each time I need to create new campaigns (not workflows) for old subscribers. They did not mention that these campaigns would be sent to both old and new subscribers who had already received similar emails.

Now you know why I cancelled the subscription.

all_reviews.review_content:

The ease of linking products from our site. It is super simple to add products and choose the photo of the item you wish to display. This makes creating newsletters for our a quick process.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There was an issue once in the past when domain authentication was required. I was confused so I emailed customer support in hopes that I would be able to speak with someone on the phone who could walk me through the process. Unfortunately that wasn't an option. I think that making calls available for users would improve the customer support aspect of Omnisend.

Another issue is on some mobile devices the newsletter format looks different than it does on a computer. The format is sometimes changed and that could potentially cause fewer sales.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Often when we send out a newsletter using Omnisend we get a bunch of online orders. Simple as that! We need to sell products and Omnisend allows us to advertise directly in our customers' inboxes.

all_reviews.review_content:

Crafting beautiful emails is a breeze with their drag-and-drop editor, and the ability to segment and personalize campaigns ensures messages hit the mark. The pre-built workflows for key customer touchpoints like cart abandonment and welcome emails are particularly valuable, automating tasks that would otherwise be time-consuming.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend streamlines my email marketing efforts, automating tasks like campaign creation and customer segmentation. This saves me time and enhances the effectiveness of my communications, leading to better engagement and increased sales.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The software only allows you to use its features on one website. This was deeply disappointing because my business has always had more than one site to promote and sell our services. They don't even offer a universal embed code for online forms that can be used on more than one site. I know we're not the only business that has more than one website, so I hope they eventually allow you to integrate the software in more than one place.

Ominisend is allowing us to automate an email newsletter in ways we couldn't do before.

all_reviews.review_title: Avoid if you are using WooCommerce
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Its simple to use and has cheaper pricing then Klaviyo

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
You get what you pay for.

If you are using ecommerce and regularly test things on staging sites, avoid Omnisend at all cost. Copying your live site to staging with omnisend plugin turned on, risks your URL getting overwritten with the staging URL, breaking automations.

they can't tell you what broke, how many customers got a bad email, and they have no need to fix it. You must
- Turn off your Omnisend plugin
- Copy live to staging (or making a new staging)
- Turn it back on on the live site
- Delet ethe plugin from the staging site.
-add it back on to the stagign site.
- connect it to a free account.

You have to do this EACH time you copy live to staging. Enjoy! We would have went with Klaviyo if we knew this.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Causing more problems then sovling them ATM.

Otherwise it send campaigns, should send transactional emails but those are very complicated to set up and they don't have basic templates for WooCommerce liek failed order reminders.

all_reviews.review_title: Ideal for small businesses and brilliant customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Overall it is quite simple to use, we like the click map feature in the Report section. The drag and drop feature is really easy to use and the pre-built sections are so handy. The customer service is excellent with replies usually within 5 minutes. We found the pricing to be quite reasonable compared to other Shopify integrated apps.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Some aspects of the interface are quite limited, for example we feel it is missing segment based reports (currently we have to duplicate campaigns to send to different segments to get accurate reporting). It also does not update tags in Shopify for customers if you edit the tags directly in Omnisend. When you ask customer service about these issues they seem receptive to feedback and requests - we're yet to see if any feedback has been acted on though.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing with more in-depth analysis and content sections than the basic Shopify email.

all_reviews.review_title: Good ESP for the email marketer, reasonable prices, very friendly and useful support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like Omnisend because it's quite simple, but all best practices for e-commerce are available there. The prices are reasonable, the integration with Shopify works great, and the customer support works excellent. I am especially greatful to Maria from customer support, she helps me to find the best solutions in a moment :) Maria, thank you so much. I like the built-in email editor, the main automations include all best practices. I see that the team improve the product. For example, the reports were updated a bit ago and new ones are better that the previous version. Good job, Omnisend! Strongly recommend.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Honestly Klaviyo is slightly more powerful in terms of functionality, but also much more expensive. Also I had some small dificulties building segments, but finally it was just a small logical task :)

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
The main issue Omnisend helps solving is reactivation of users and increasing LTV of clients. My own case is +180% of GMV of e-store on Shopify for niche e-commerce in EU.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the best email marketing tools we've used!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Besides the ease of drag and drop Email building, the most helpful thing about Omnisend is there constant improvements to the platform. They continue to listen to their customers and add new features that help us market our products and services to our customers.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
What we dislike about Omnisend is their Content section. There's no way to organize all of your pictures into folders. This would make adding content easier and quicker and more organized. Instead of typing the picture name or scrolling to you find it, it would be so much easier to have content placed into folders we can create and manage.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are sending car abandonment, emails, product recommendation emails, transactional emails, and marketing emails. We are also using a list builder to continue to grow our reach as well as the SMS features to send direct marketing messages to our customers. All of this is being done on the on the same platform.

all_reviews.review_title: Recommended email marketing software for ecommerce stores
all_reviews.review_content:

Intuitive dashboard. Connecting WooCommerce store with Omnisend account through Omnisend WordPress plugin works like a charm. Initial tasks like setting first subscriber form, welcome email to new subscribers, abandoned cart email are set seamlessly. The free version (500 contacts) has all the features of paid plans.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Cannot point out anything right now. However, there is always a room for improvement.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
For our WordPress websites that use WooCommerce plugin for e-commerce, we find Omnisend very handy. Being especially made for e-commerce stores, Omnisend will most likely already have features and templates for any business/use case.  Readymade templates for emails, transactional emails, SMS messages together with exhaustive reporting.

What do you like best about Omnisend?
Signed up for the FREE account about 7 to 10 days ago. Set up the automation workflows which is easily done with their drag-and-drop builder. As of this writing,  we're up just over $700 in revenue, from just the free email automations we set up. We just signed up for the paid plan and are looking forward to even more sales after starting to run promo campaigns. Their capabilities to set up so many different segments will allow us to target promos to different niches within our customer base. We're an online women's clothing store, so being able to target contacts based on interests is huge. This whole experience so far is fantastic, not to mention the thorough and quick support on the Chat whenever we need it, 24/7. Highly recommend!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Honestly, not a thing so far. Of course, it's tedious to sometimes work through any technical challenges through Chat, but we've had each one resolved quickly. There is an option for an Account Manager to work with each client, but we aren't there yet, so Chat it is.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've not been with them long enough to give feedback on that.

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend Delivers Exceptional Email Marketing: A Game-Changer for Our Business!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I have 14 years of experience with email marketing. After testing several email marketing platforms, including Salesforce Marketing Cloud and Klaviyo, Omnisend has completely transformed my experience with its outstanding features and benefits. Making the switch from Salesforce Marketing Cloud to Omnisend was one of the best decisions for my organization, and I haven't looked back since.

Key benefits of Omnisend include:

Exceptional Deliverability Rate: Omnisend boasts the highest deliverability rate I've ever seen, significantly improving our open and conversion rates.

Shopify Convenience: Effortless integration with our Shopify store makes managing email campaigns a breeze.

Email List Cleaning Feature: Keeps our contact list up-to-date and free from invalid or unengaged subscribers, ensuring optimal email performance.

24/7 Live Customer Support: Access to responsive and knowledgeable support agents via chat anytime we need assistance.

Dynamic Shopify Coupons: Customize and include unique discount codes in emails to boost sales and customer engagement.

Seamless Product Embedding: Easily incorporate products from our Shopify store into emails for a streamlined and professional look.

Omnisend has truly elevated our email marketing strategy compared to our previous experience with Salesforce Marketing Cloud.

I highly recommend it to anyone looking to enhance their organization's marketing efforts, especially if you are a Shopify merchant.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
While Omnisend has numerous advantages, there are a few areas where it could be improved:

1. Webhook Method: The current webhook method leaves something to be desired and can be somewhat limiting. An improved and more flexible webhook system would be a welcome enhancement.

2. Backend Interface: The backend isn't as convenient as it could be for graphic teams to work on templates. A more user-friendly interface or additional customization options would make it easier for design teams to create visually appealing emails.

3. Integration Library: Though Omnisend's integration library is diverse, it doesn't quite measure up to Klaviyo's extensive offerings. Expanding the range of available integrations would make Omnisend even more powerful and versatile for users.


Despite these minor shortcomings, Omnisend remains a valuable email marketing platform that has significantly improved our organization's marketing efforts.

With continued development and improvements, I believe it has the potential to be the go-to solution for many businesses.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend has effectively addressed several key business challenges for our organization, providing significant benefits:

1. Enhanced Deliverability: Higher open and conversion rates due to exceptional deliverability.

2; Shopify Integration: Simplified email campaign management through seamless integration.

3. List Management: Optimized email performance with an up-to-date contact list.

4. Accessible Support: Efficient issue resolution with 24/7 live customer support chat.

5. Improved Promotions: Boosted sales and customer loyalty with dynamic Shopify coupons.

6. Professional Design: Polished emails through seamless product embedding from our Shopify store.

Overall, Omnisend has streamlined our email marketing strategy, resulting in increased sales, better customer engagement, and more effective marketing efforts.

all_reviews.review_title: OK for pure ecommerce sites, but not the best customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The platform has useful integrations for ecomm sites to show successful orders, set up automations for cart abandons, etc.

The email builder is pretty standard, with all the drag and drop functionality you'd expect from an ESP.

That said, if your business is not a simple ecomm site, this probably isn't the platform for you.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
We had our account paused without notice multiple times because we didn't connect an ecommerce site. During the sales cycle, we weren't made aware that the platform is designed almost exclusively for ecommerce sites. This caused us to miss a teaser for one of our main client campaigns because it wasn't resolved quickly. In fact, it wasn't resolved by Customer Service at all--our internal tech team tried a few things and then our account was automatically unpaused. (Only to be paused again with zero notice because we'd connected our website but were conducting marketing for a client website we host.)

The tags and lists are a bit confusing on an initial setup.

Exporting contacts is a nightmare because it doesn't allow you to export by list--it's all or nothing.

We used the forms feature to collect some customer information, and we found out halfway through collecting responses that there was a bug limiting the information collected to just name and email--the two things we'd already had at the start. While customer service eventually offered a clunky solution, we were initially told that our data could be trapped for months and that we would just have to start over.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were looking for a simple email solution to handle client marketing and easily keep our business marketing separate. While in theory the platform does offer that--and the email builder works well--there were numerous issues in implementation that created new problems.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend integrated easily with WooCommerce with almost no needed expertise beyond basic WordPress knowledge. From there, setting up my signup forms, abandoned cart recovery emails and launching my first campaign was easy. In fact, before I even started my campaign, I had already recovered multiple abandoned carts!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Omnisend is definitely geared towards ecommerce sites. If your website doesn't have a shopping cart or an easy way to track and trace customer leads, Omnisend's tools may not be as useful for you.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have wanted to jump into email marketing for a while, but most programs have been too simple or could not fully connect to our WooCommerce store. Omnisend was able to integrate within minutes of signing up, and even offered us solutions (like abandoned cart recovery and dynamic discount codes) that were impossible with several of their competitors.

Omnisend's automation features and forms also allow us to create segments of our diverse customer base so we can target our campaigns more granularly.

all_reviews.review_title: Very easy to use and set up defaults for quick letter building!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like how easy it is to set up your default emails, and to set up multiples so you can have a cohesive newsletter everytime.  For me the thing that kept me from using a newsletter was the amount of time it would take away from me to do other things but I have found that Omnisend makes it so easy to set up a template so you can speed by your newsletter content every month ! Spend less time writing emails and more time doing what you want to do while keeping your customer informed about what's going on in your shop/business. I have really enjoyed Omnisend so far.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
My only gripe so far is there is not fix for overiding dark mode on people's phones so if you have a white background and black text when it defaults to dark mode on people's mobile devices it will be white on white text! xox My only fix is don't use white backgrounds!

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Solving the problem of spending too much time formatting each and every email by providing me with customizable and editable templates that I can set up and then reuse everytime i need to send an email.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
- The support team is super helpful
- Overall very robust; lots of options beyond what I use it for
- If you can manage your subscriber list (manually), then the pricing is pretty great compared to other platforms.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
- I don't like having to manually adjust "non-subscribers" to "unsubscribed" to make sure the accurate amount of subscribers is getting billed. It would make more sense that non-subscribers would automatically not be included in billable contacts. Every month I have to make sure to manually unsubscribe extra users to keep our monthly bill down.
- The email formatting is a bit limited. It would be nice to have more creative templates and formatting.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's allowing us to create marketing emails for our small business and provide helpful metrics.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
My favourite aspect is the heat maps and being able to see who clicked on my email exactly and where they clicked. I am able to pinpoint and reach specific customers this way.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The least helpful tool in Omnisend would be the customer limit on your account. I have to upload and remove customers often to keep the number below the limit count. I can send 18000 emails a month but only to X amount of customers, I have to always upload and delete. Minor issue.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Reaching out to thousands of customers daily that may not know about my services and what I offer. I am able to reach out to these people and expand my list of services as well.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Heather, our implementation representative, was the best part of Omnisend. If you could duplicate Heather, you would have great company and excellent service, but unfortunately, everyone else is pretty clueless.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
We asked to downgrade the account to a free one because we are transitioning. All we received was a link to the FAQ, which did not help our situation. So after going back and forth with myself and a couple of team members for a few weeks, we finally just froze the account. We then got billed for 3 of our brands and requested a refund, and they issued credits to our account. Customer service was awful, and a lot of features that were promised were not existent. The help desk said certain features were impossible, and our implementation representative, Heather, figured it out and was excellent.  Not a platform for advanced marketing. You cannot search SMS, and SMS numbers are not associated with the contact record, which makes it very time-consuming. I would recommend skipping it if you are vetting ESPs.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
None, they have lost our business. We decided to move on after receiving that they were issuing credit to our account after I asked for a refund because we wanted to pause until our marketing budget was decided.

all_reviews.review_title: All you need in one app
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
What I like best about using Omnisend is it has various systems that you can use to track customers and send out marketing in different formats. What I like best is that you can create a campaign all inside of Omnisend only that will use your Shopify data to create it. There are different parameters and automation that you can put in place and once it is in place it is only a matter of maintenance to make sure things are running fully.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I dislike that there is a bit of a learning curve to get things set up. There is a lot of trial and error to make sure that you are doing things correctly and efficiently. It also seems like a big app that is very powerful but learning all the many things it can do can take some time to get the hang of it.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problem that Omnisend solves is really taking the reigns on marketing. Although it may take a bit to get the hang of things, the app builders have thought of everything with this. There are so many tools that you can use to maximize your gains and ensure that you are sending quality content on a specialized schedule. I sent out emails that I was able to handle the times and dates and frequencies which puts your mind at ease, especially during the holiday season. You can plan your marketing as detailed as you'd like for it to be.

all_reviews.review_title: Very happy with our experience so far
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The email templates are simple, they're not too bulky and I can get my point across easily. I like the plain text options to keep it personal from time to time. I like the spinning wheel option for email signups. It's a great way to add a bit of fun to the experience. It was easy for me to transfer from Mailchimp and I find Omnisend a much more user friendly and cost effective option to Mailchimp.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I haven't found anything that we dislike at this point. I've been with Omnisend for a few months now and I have found the support to be good when we've needed it and overall, it's been a good transfer from Mailchimp.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Being a business owner I have a lot on my mind all the time and I can often overlook simple steps to improve my site. I like how when I come to the Omnisend dashboard it will tell me if there is a step I need to take so I don't have to spend time figuring this out for myself. For example it may tell me I need a product abandonment workflow and then it will take me through the steps to create one.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I love how userfriendly the system is and how many options it has for creating email campaigns, landing pages and segmenting lists for users! My absolute favourite feature is the dashboard for their Omnisend partners which allows me to manage all my client's Omnisend profiles from one account. Such a great platform for businesses that are new to email marketing or advanced. I'm looking forward to starting SMS campaigns soon thanks to Omnisend!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Omnisend doesn't have some of the fun interaction pieces that other platforms have (at least not yet) so it's hard to drive engagement via emails without polls, quizzes and things like that that we can build into the emails. I hope these are features they will be adding soon!

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend partners profile allows me to manage all my client's Omnisend profiles from one account which is a huge advantage so I don't have to remember usernames and passwords to multiple client accounts.

all_reviews.review_title: Most amount of features for the price
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like the pre-built automation & pre-built audience segments

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I wish you could connect two Shopify stores to one email account (without having to swap between accounts) as this is something Mailchimp does.
Otherwise, I wish you could add additional data to your audience, such as assigning customer lifetime value that isn't just a tag.
I also would like the Shopify app to have functionality to stop certain emails from syncing to Omnisend either by domain or tag.
I also would like more updated and better-looking email templates like Flowdesk.
Also when adding images to emails, it's annoying not being able to drag and drop multiple images instead of having to click upload and the uploading one by one. Once again, this is standard in Mailchimp.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helping nurture customers with automation and pre-built segments. I also really like all of the information on the Omnisend blog such as good subject lines, and the subject line checker

all_reviews.review_title: Switched to OmniSend, and haven't looked back.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The pricing structure makes more sense than the previous service we were using. As you grow your business and lists, the pricing reflects that. You can start using OmniSend right away without having to pay very much at all, which is an ideal situation.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Some more advanced metrics would be helpful. I'd look to see a full breakdown of how much revenue (percentage wise), is being brought in from each service OmniSend provides (Email, SMS, and Push-Notifications).

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mainly pricing as I said before. We were using another service for years that raised their pricing to levels that were completely unsustainable for us. Also, OmniSend has more helpful customer support which is a big bonus,

all_reviews.review_title: Efficient, easy to use, top notch customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I signed up to Omnisend as a complete beginner regarding email marketing. I had taken classes but had never gotten around to setting up an email list. Omnisend was easy enough for me to do it effortlessly, especially with their free course and their templates for automation. Segmenting was the part I feared the most; even this was not that hard. Omnisend saves up a lot of time, and stats are also easy to see. The customer service is super reactive and friendly; they are always ready to help or answer any questions.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I think the email templates are not very useful, and their automatic branding is not exact. I'd rather make my own templates. Also, being able to use gradient colors would be awesome, as many businesses nowadays use gradients for their branding (myself included).

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend is perfect for email marketing beginners. They have free resources to teach you the basics and seem always to be improving their product. As a beginner, being able to ask questions is essential, and their team never fails to respond quickly.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
For the past four years, I've used several email campaign providers, but none have provided the best customer service, a simple setup, and amazing templates. If you're new to Omnisend, YouTube videos can be extremely beneficial. If you get stuck, the Omnisend customer service team is very polite and responds quickly. It was also simple to set up. I had to use an API to transfer my data to Omnisend, so I simply followed the instructions.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
At first, I was confused by the Segmentation features they've recently updated, but now I get it. As soon as I found what I was looking for, I realized it was actually better than I expected. In my opinion, their lack of communication or explanation was a con for me.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation is fantastic, and it's what we're focusing on right now. After a while, you realise how automating steps can save you time and money, so it's similar to e-commerce marketing. Because Omnisend's automaton are so intuitive and good, learning and implementing them was a breeze.

all_reviews.review_title: Simple and Cost-effective Email Solution for Ecommerce Companies
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend is an intuitive easy-to-use interface that features drag-and-drop template builders. It has all the features you need to send emails and build automation.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
If you're looking for a more robust marketing automation tool that enables you to send emails based on more complex if-then scenarios, then you may want to look at another platform. Omnisend is perfect for organizations that need the ability to send newsletters, automated responses, and build forms to capture customer information.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend integrates seamlessly with our ecommerce platform, Shopify. We're able to see purchase information from our Omnisend dashboard. We are also able to build contact capture forms for our newsletter.

all_reviews.review_title: Good platform with the potential for greatness
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
One of the things I've seen with Omnisend that I haven't seen with other platforms is the Booster function. It takes the guesswork out of sending an email to people who didn't engage with the first one which I really like.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The ability to gather data and reporting on customers and emails is difficult at times and complicated. My biggest issue though is the amount of work that goes into sending an A/B test for an email. This should be built into the segments or something so that I can simply send two emails to one segment and it'll divide it automatically. Creating a workflow and adding/deleting people from segments is far more complicated than it should and something I've never seen done. Also, you should be able to combine multiple segments into one for testing purposes instead of relying on tags.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We need to be able to reach our customers and send content that is engaging and effective at driving sales. With Omnisend, we are able to do that as well as track sales and where new email subscribers come from.

This should be built into the segments or something so that I can simply send two emails to one segment and it'll divide it automatically. Creating a workflow and adding/deleting people from segments is far more complicated than it should and something I've never seen done. Also, you should be able to combine multiple segments into one for testing purposes instead of relying on tags.

all_reviews.review_title: A powerhouse tool that is cost efficient
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The fact that the tool is easy to use and is designed to help you achieve your goals with a good share of built-in workflows that you are advertised to set up in order to gain the most out of this software.
Their customer support is knowledgeable and available 24/7.
The option to Boost campaign is a great bonus as on other software you have to manually do this operation

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Downsides so far for us are:
If you started to create a campaign, you can't change it into an AB test or vice versa. Therefore in case your team set something up wrong you would need to spend some more time to save the entire template and then reapply to a new campaign and set up all the other details.
You can't have more lists, just more segments.
The segment creation  + automated workflows are a bit less complex than the competitors. Depending on your business, you might find this annoying and time-consuming to find workarounds.
There is a deliverability warmup built-in tool but it's a bit hard to find at first
The list hygiene tool that is available can only be used for the entire account (including non-subscribed people) which brings the pricing up and you can't edit anything.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We promised our customers daily deals and not all platforms offer an unlimited sending plan as Omnisend without becoming prohibitive in terms of price.
This is helping up stay on top of our promise while also having an acceptable ROI

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend is a great tool for any kind of e-commerce shop
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Integration with most of the popular CMS's is the best thing. It's smooth, takes no effort, and it just works. You can easily integrate products, discounts and etc. from your shop into e-mails. Integration of sign-up forms is also very easy and seamless.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Not being able to create complex landing pages. You are only limited to creating simple, no-scroll landing pages with nothing but a few lines of text and a sign-up form. The only other option left to choose is an embedded sign-up form, which you have to embed onto your website manually. It would be great to see a landing page editor that is similar to e-mail editor.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mainly we are using Omnisend for retaining abandoned carts - customers receive an automatic letter with contents of their abandoned cart with an invitation to continue their purchase. If they don't proceed with the purchase, second letter is sent with a discount code, which is generated automatically, which is nice. We also use Omnisend for sending e-mails to newsletter subscribers.

all_reviews.review_title: Great for small & medium size businesses
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The integration was easy. Automations are incredibly easy to set up as well! They've redone the home page giving a clearer understanding of email performance. Pricing is comparable to others. Overall, I like Omnisend in comparison to other well-known email providers that we've also used.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I would like to see categories for email types so we can see how one email type (i.e. newsletter) performs against another type (i.e. flash sales, new product intros, etc). They have basic pop-up options but I would like to see more options where we can use graphics we design and fully customize the pop-up. I'd like to see them get directly integrated with LeadPages.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
They truly listen to customer requests and actively show progress towards meeting these requests. Their communication is stellar with upcoming changes/new features and their service has been top-notch!

all_reviews.review_title: Email automation that doesn't automatically send email! So Dumb
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Simple user interface and email template builder

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Doesn't work to actually send out emails. System literally doesn't work. I set up an automation so people will automatically receive a welcome email. It literally stopped sending emails after 3,000 even though my plan says I can send up to 60,000. I contacted support, and they said there is nothing they can do. They can manually add email credit to their system, but that doesn't actually let the system send any automated emails.

System doesn't let you upgrade your plan immediately. I am adding 2,000+ new subscribers per day. Omnisend isn't designed for growing companies that want to build their subscriber list and send emails. The least friendly marketing automation tool I've tried to use.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Trying to send emails for my e-commerce company

all_reviews.review_content:

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
It could do with more usable templates, easier to use flows & automations. The ability to visualise automations isn't as simple and one major thing it is lacking, is a way to autosend after X period, to those that do not open an email blast.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you aren't using shopify, then this is a great email marketing tool to use for your business. It's cost effective, simple to set up and has easy to use functions.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're trying to reach out audience via automated emails & email blasts. Omnisend can offer a cost-effective way to do this, as it's much cheaper than it's competitors, whilst offering good value for money.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool to automate your email marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Pre-built email marketing automation workflows are great to use. I'd definitely appreciate more of these! Audience tagging is easy and we used that to exclude segments from some campaigns. The Product Picker is a great feature which allows you to pick the products to add to the email directly form the website. A bit slow sometimes in loading but it works well and saves time.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Prices increase too much when you start scaling the business. The natural growth of your mailing list will bring you to price tiers which, in my opinion, are a bit too expensive. Triggers and workflows in-out mechanisms are not easy to use. We realized after a couple of months that some of the workflows were not working correctly as the setup hadn't been done properly - but it was pretty hard, even with the Omnisend support team, to understand what we should have done instead of what we had done.
There are now few pre-built audience segmentations, but we still haven't found them helpful - I'd like to see more AI recommendations and segmentation in place.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing automation. The available pre-built email marketing automation workflows are fantastic. We have quickly built welcome, abandoned cart, onboarding, cross-sales, reactivation workflows and many more in a relatively short amount of time. Some of them are basic though, and we had to spend time customizing and improving. Email designs also are somewhat limited. Generally speaking, the available pre-made designs are good but we could use thematic designs for the campaigns (for example, more Christmas, Valentines', Black Fridays templates etc). Also, we could use more design elements (example background patterns: there are a few - but the choices are not many).

What do you like best about Omnisend?
Initial set-up was incredibly easy and the integrations with my Shopify store were straightforward. The UI is extremely clean and easy to find what you're looking for with everything labelled correctly and intuitive in design.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I am aware they are currently going through some changes in the structure of billing and adding new features but I sometimes find myself unable to use certain features. I'm sure with some more digging I would be able to find out the cause but it does prevent me from achieving tasks that I set out to do

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:

As someone who is not well versed with email marketing, I need a tool that would clearly just tell me what I needed to do to make something work. This achieves that and each time I send out new emails I try to be a bit more adventurous using more and more of the suite to better my campaigns

all_reviews.review_title: All round good experience & user friendly
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I most enjoy the tracking links and the display of the stats/reporting - it's easy to see and read. Something else I've found helpful is the ability to duplicate campaigns, which saves me a lot of time. We also really like the intergration with Shopify and how easy it is to use in that respect.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I don't enjoy being so restricted to the templates, I would love to customize more, by this I mean creating our own template and placing images / text where we would like. I would also like to see more variation on content types, such as animations e.g. Scrolling text etc. I also feel the mobile version is more limited and doesn't display as well as desktop - which isn't great considering most of our users are more likely to use a mobile phone

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I would certainly recommend Omnisend to first-timers/people who have'nt used email marketing before. The layout is simple and its very user friendly. If you are someone who isn't overly fussed on large scale/brand personalization Omnisend is perfect.It also offers great intergration with Shopify, so its great for an ecommerce bussiness - which is the type of bussiness we run. The clear reporting and analytics of campaigns / automations is a great feature and has been really helpful to target our audience.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are seeing a great impact on campaign-based marketing and getting the word out on sales / special offers. We are also seeing an increase in subcribers.

all_reviews.review_title: Thrilled with the Automations and Workflows!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I've been using Omnisend for our business for a few months now and have been very impressed with all of the recommended workflows that are ready-built in the background. I've used these to set up automations for several different scenarios and have found these essential for our CRM. The automations are definitely what I like best about using Omnisend as they are incredibly efficient - do the work once and then the automations are regularly sent with no additional work required!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
So far I haven't found any downsides to using Omnisend, if there is ever anything I can't work out, I can always find a guide online explaining what I am trying to do. No complaints!

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Draft a list of requirements needed and check the price of competitors. Omnisend offers a lot of functionality in regards to workflows, segmentation and automations for what I considered to be a very reasonable price when compared to other email marketing software.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Before using Omnisend, we definitely had a problem with our Customer Relationship Management (CRM) - Omnisend solves this for us as their automations, workflows and segmentation are integral to taking care of our customers from start to finish. We've been able to segment our customers into even greater detail than we ever have before and have developed new targeted mail campaigns as well as super specific cross-selling targeted marketing campaigns. Omnisend automations mean that our website is selling for us with no actual further work involved from our end. The benefits have been - better taken care of customers, better traffic to the website and even an improvement in sales!

Pretty easy to navigate and plug & chug. I like the ease of moving sections and that I can simply copy email campaigns to repurpose for new ones (makes it easier to keep footer, logo and formatting in place so I don't have to redo). Customer service is also amazing! Quick to reply and very, very helpful with any question I've ever had!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
A little more challenging to get acquainted with automation and workflows - took me a while to make edits to an automated email.  I also feel fonts are a bit limited. I have to go in and adjust fonts/colors continually with each campaign which gets to be timely.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Better pricing with a tiered system vs other platforms.

I fully recommend Omnisend to new people for their email marketing and try this software free of cost. Overall,  my experience is worthful.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The live view and stats/reports are very helpful. We're able to see what our customers are most interested in, and what they're doing on our website. The reports are helping us constantly improve our marketing.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
We would love to have the ability to upload specific brand fonts to use in our emails. Using cohesive branding is very important to us and this has been the biggest drawback so far.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
We enjoy using Omnisend. Setting up automations can take a bit of time, but it's easy once you get the hang of it (nearly everything is drag and drop).

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're able to see exactly what customers are doing on our site. It's helping us fine-tune our marketing, and make web updates when needed. The automations and ease of sending email campaigns are helping us stay in better contact with potential customers.

all_reviews.review_title: An Excellent Ecommerce Marketing Automation Platform for Small Business and Startup (Plus More)
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The most impressive thing about Omnisend is how easy they make it to build both decent looking emails, and automation as well. The interface is intuitive, the customizations are plentiful, and there are options for much deeper customization and future opportunities as well. They also provide a wealth of information both in webinars, help documentation, and via tooltips in the application that answer pretty much every question you have - whether it's about the application itself or marketing automation and best practices in general. This has helped me grasp concepts and more complex ideas more easily which have turned in to actionable items and results.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There isn't much to dislike about Omnisend so far, but I did wish they had a few more templated options or pre-built options that didn't require so much customization out of the bock. The line-height, spacing, text choices, etc. that are canned do require a lot of changes and only some of the modules available in the editor allow you to save them for future use. Assuming this will be fixed in the future if it already isn't on the way.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest problem I'm solving with Omnisend is saving time and making sure all of my boxes are checked to maximize contact with my customers on a regular basis. They make it easy, including really robust reporting and a nice dashboard that makes turning things on/off, A/B testing, customization, etc really easy. I'm realizing more and more about my audience that I wouldn't have if I didn't have some of the reporting for analytics, and the easy of use for creating new experiments.

all_reviews.review_title: Not intuitive and contact management is terrible
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
It's easy to make a campaign, the design looks fantastic, and this is the only part my team and I can easily use. We use campaign, segmentation, reports, etc., but only the campaign section has an acceptable UX. Although, it could show a preview of the campaign once we enter it, not only its performance.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The reports aren't the best. Probably we need to fine-tune our daily tasks there. And I never saw contact management as bad as in Omnisend. First of all, you need to edit the contact to see which fields are filled there - it should be the first thing shown: the name, the company, the email, and the activity. Then, the bulk selection isn't easy, as it only selects the contacts shown (and you need to have endless pressing button activities to "load more").
Last but not least, the customer service, and its FAQ, aren't clear. It takes a long time to wait for a proper reply - or to find an answer. Sometimes it takes so long that it becomes an email thread.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are making beautiful campaigns, but we probably need a better understanding of the tool possibilities to use it to its maximum. As it's not an intuitive tool, we may need proper training.

all_reviews.review_title: Lots of options to configure a variety of campaign types that fit our needs.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
My favorite part about OmniSend is the wide variety of options to set up specific segments, campaign flows, and customer groups. It really allows you to configure just about any segment you need using any customer data, shopping/browsing/buying history, and other details.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
It has taken our team a little bit of getting used to the options available. Some of the language can be a little bit confusing in setting up segments. Once you get used to it, it makes better sense, just takes some time.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We utilized OmniSend for customer sign-ups, which allows us to easily segment based on self-identified tags. This has also allowed us to start sending customized, targeted emails right away based on a persona that the customer provides. We have seen an increase in revenue generated from automation emails and we are looking forward to utilizing that feature more in the future.

all_reviews.review_title: Just starting with Omnisend. Coming from Mailchimp
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I'm just starting with the app but there are some things that I already like a lot compared to Mailchimp (where I'm coming from).
First of all, I love the full integration with Shopify. I'm someone who uses Shopify for every transaction in my company, so this is extremely relevant.
I also like the integrated forms like the roulette to capture leads. This was a very annoying process before because I had to use another app to have this feature, so it's super helpful to have everything coming from the same app.
I'm also liking the way the app uses segmentation. I will test it during the next month and see if is how I imagine it to be.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Not at all for the moment. I will have a clearer picture after some time of using it.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
The price is very attractive and it seems to have all the features needed for a small company like mine. It looks much better than Mailchimp, but I need to do some testing first.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I need to know who my customers really are and a way of segmenting the several types of clients my business has. I think this process will be much easier from now on because of the ease of use and the segmentation features.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent customer service, clean design, easy to automate
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I reviewed a lot of options before recommending Omnisend to my client as our email platform for their ecom fitness brand. Because it's designed so well for ecom, the workflows and automation have been incredibly intuitive and easy to set up.  The designs are gorgeous, modern and accessible. The customer service has been outstanding! They give really thorough answers when I get stuck, and take on suggestions too. I know I can move past any hurdles in safe hands.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
One thing I didn't favor was the template discrepancies. I dived in early and selected some but found elements were not interchangeable. It's possible I missed tutorials on this - But I wish had that information from the start because it made it harder later to make our emails fully uniform.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Great option if you are an ecom brand looking for well-designed emails that are easy to execute and automate. It's simple to get started, has a great range of tutorials and support, and is also cost effective.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Really easy to tag and set up flows. Good, clear reporting so far.
