all_reviews.review_title: Doesn't work if you have a online and physical location
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I really like how you can decide which month you want to email and which months you want to pause your account. I enoy the walkthorugh process as it makes it fairly easy and simple for the user to make a email wihtout having to watch multiple tutorials.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I really dislike how they say they care so much about your emailing preputation but make it so hard to be able to get rid of your emails that bounce. For example in my store we have our online customers who are outmatically added onto the list when they place an order but we also have a physical location where customers sign up to receive emails when they checkout. After they sign up through our store system we then add them into omnisend and it flags them as bad emails because we import them. Because we still want to send emails to our in store customers we send out an email and it gets flagged becuase every customer who we imported was marked as bouncing emails when they were brand new. In order to unlock our privelgives we have to go to an external site and get our list "cleaned." I tried communicatuing with staff and asking if there was a way could just use omnisend. There actually was a way, only thing is I was still required to pay to get my list cleaned before I could send out emails. Even thoguh they had their own way of letting me know emails that were bouncing I still had to pay to get my list cleaned. After my list gets cleaned I loose 1/3 of my customers because they all came from our physical location. In order for me to get those customers back I have to show proof that they choose to receive these emails or have them sign up an additonal time which makes it a big hassle for the customer and the cashier especially in our busy season. Maybe not the best option for company with an online and physical location.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you have a online and physical location, i would not recommend

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I feel like I have ran into more problems since using omnisend. Our emails are getting profit and getting the word out, but the big issue for us is a lot of customers come into the store after seeing our email and bring new people to our store but we cant send them emails becasue they get marked as bad emails

I also love the detailed segmenting options that integrate with my Shopify store. It allows me to send specific email campaigns for various customer segments. I also love their SMS and how it can be utilized within the automations to work in tandem with the emails.

I wish they had some better reporting and analytics. We have hundreds of SKUs on our website so it would be great if I could easily see what product(s) was/were purchased from campaigns at a glance.

What do you like best about Omnisend?
I find it an amazing application, the interface is very friendly, comfortable and easy to understand. It also has a very ergonomic design with a menu that makes it easy to find all the tools it has.

I like the integration it has with Shopify, I consider it important because I use Shopify for almost any transaction in my company.

I like the way of segmentation that the platform applies, I find it quite useful. And something that I can not fail to mention is the tool that comes integrated for attracting potential customers, for my company it is crucial to know our customers to meet their needs and their tools are great for that topic, also facilitate our work greatly.

Finally, the system it has for the dissemination of emails seems to me the coolest, it is efficient and almost no platform provides a service like this, and the fact that the platform will guide you through everything you have to do tutorial type and without having to look for how to do it on the internet.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
It is really easy to set up and use. I love the Automations that I can do with Omnisend it makes it easy to create workflows and have them work for you. I like that i  can easily see the stats with this Automation too. I can easily see how many opens, clicks and revenue I receive from sending out the emails.
I really love the live view! i have been using that a lot and can see what my customers are doing. I think one thing that would improve that would be having a chat feature attached to that .

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Im still learning about all the features and probably dont have a firm grasp of all the things I can actually do with this email marketing program. I Would probably like to see some quick and easy training that relates to my needs. I also dont like that I havent been able to eaily update my contact list when I have ammended it in the backend. That has been frustrating me a little of late

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I think you should do a trial of Omnisend. It was easy to set up and create new automation and test out their features. i would give them a go to see the stats and what you can learn about your customers from the information to can get. It would really help to improve your email marketing.  Their pricing is also really competitive but they have some great features. If you are working with Shopify its so easy to integrate.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Probably the main problem I am starting to solve is abandon carts. I have a workflow setup for Abandoned Carts and its really helpful to be able to send out 3 different emails to create some urgency and bring the customer back to their cart. Im still new to Omnisend but I can see the benefits to having this automation set up.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The platform has a very nice look to it and is generally pretty intuitive. I like how easy it is to create emails. I do however, wish that there was more saved customization available in those emails. Most things need to be resized each time you add them. It's not a deal breaker, but it is a time waster

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I don't like the lack of customer behavior insights. It would be great to be able to see  which pages my subscribers have been to and what they've done while they're there. I know that this is a possibility because I had that information while using Klaviyo.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
This is a great email software to use. It integrates easily with Shopify. And has most all the functionality that a young company could need. I suspect it will be found lacking a bit once we've grown a great deal since there do not seem to be any insights into customer behaviors on my website, such as Klaviyo offers. However, the cost is much more reasonable! Recommended most for newer organizations and start ups.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I just got all my automations set up. Can't wait to have that on autopilot. I also am using Omnisend to send out an Abandoned Cart automation to hopefully recoup some of that lost revenue.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The automation. They are pretty easy to set up once you get the hang of them. Most of the processes have  thought through for you. To my surprise, there are a lot of inputs that I did not think of, and they make it easy for you to set up. Let me add that the customer service is also fantastic. They are quick to respond and give solutions.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
It gets too technical sometimes, specific processes require you to understand C before when you want to do A. This gets confusing sometimes, and  wish all the tutorials come with voiceovers for you to properly understand what you are watching.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
It is reliable, affordable and effective. Omnisend makes it easy for you to run automations for your business plus the analytics are easy to understand. The customer service is very responsive, patient and helpful.

all_reviews.review_title: Super easy to set up and get insights from your email campaigns
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I have really enjoyed using Omnisend as part of our marketing strategy. I am not someone who was trained in design or coding, so a platform that makes it easy to create, follow up and keep track of our email efforts is vital, and Omnisend does just that. It easily integrates with our ecommerce site, and it's been a joy to run a/b tests, create segemnts, come up with automated campaigns and explore all that email has to offer with Omnisend. Would highly recommend to any marketer looking for an email tool that's easy to set up (in all aspects) and for smaller teams who really need to be able to do it all.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Creating audience segments can be hard and takes some time to get used to, but once you get the hand of it, using those is great to optimize email marketing campaigns.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I've used several email marketing tools and I have to say Omnisend has been one of the most complete ones that strikes a good balance between ease of use and capabilities.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are trying to generate more awareness of our brand and products within a very specific niche. Email has really helped us understand our target and what messages can help drive sales.

Email marketing has always been one task I love to avoid because I thought it required a lot of settings. When I got introduced to Omnisend, it has been a relief. The free option doesn't have the automations and it's a big step going to the standard plan which is $30 per month. Would be nice to have like a "a la carte" plan where you can choose what you really want to use.

Gaining customers
automation for abandoned carts
shipping confirmation and order confirmation with branded emails.
You can see what is working on not and make adjustments.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The most helpful thing about omnisend is the segments of customers and the many different variables you can select segment the customers into. We like that we can select customers based on if they opened the previous campaign email or not. We like the statistics that we are provided with such as email open rate, email unsubscriber rate as well the graph that shows the open rate within 24 hours.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
We haven't found anything that we have disliked and we have been using omnisend since February 2021. If I may add, as much as we like the graph that shows the open rate of emails, we would suggest that the graph shows the open rate for the first 48 hours rather than the first 24 hours. In our industry and with our audience (mostly mothers), we have seen that our customers tend to open emails within 48 hours and this graph would be very useful for our brand to know.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I would suggest using the free trial version first, getting to know and understand the different features available on omnisend. Use the free trial to also understand your customers a bit better and then upgrade to the paid plan. Use the free trial also to send out a few emails to see which of your subscribers have valid emails that way, when you do upgrade to the paid version, your subscriber list contains valid subscribers.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
What benefits have we realized- we are able to see which products our customers view the most and this helps us to include these products in our next email. We, as a brand are becoming more aware of our user's journey as they go through the website. We are able to see what time they visit the website, how long they stay on the website and which product category they visit, and in what order they navigate the website.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I just started my business in Oct of 2020 and I have gained so many email subscribers through their popup feature and also through their automation systems! I am a small boutique so customers always love a discount code. With Omnisend, I am able to send a discount code to the customer after they sign up for our newsletters/emails through the pop up feature. Another great feature I love is the automation system. You can customize each automation system to your liking! When I first started the automation, they already had a template so I did not need to make them up on my own. I was able to start out with their template and then adjust it from there! The free version does enough but I would recommend upgrading after your trial to get more helpful features!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Since my business is still very small, I was not putting as much time into marketing so my sales were not great starting out so I had to downgrade back down to my free version. I am hoping after sales ramp up I can go back to using the paid version since there are more marketing options available.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you are a small business and want a way to reach your customers easier, I would recommend Omnisend for your email marketing. They have multiple templates that allow you to easily add photos and text fast and efficiently as well as scheduling your emails so you can create all of your email content for the month if you wanted. The scheduling tool is such a helpful feature!

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was able to gain almost 100 email subscribers in a short period of time! I learned quickly that sometimes when you send too many emails, customers will unsubscribe. The email marketing and SMS marketing are great tools to interact with customers for potential sales!

I am hoping after sales ramp up I can go back to using the paid version since there are more marketing options available.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
review_question_answers.answer: If you are a small business and want a way to reach your customers easier, I would recommend Omnisend for your email marketing. They have multiple templates that allow you to easily add photos and text fast and efficiently as well as scheduling your emails so you can create all of your email content for the month if you wanted. The scheduling tool is such a helpful feature!

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I was able to gain almost 100 email subscribers in a short period of time! I learned quickly that sometimes when you send too many emails, customers will unsubscribe. The email marketing and SMS marketing are great tools to interact with customers for potential sales!

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend is easy to use and cheaper than other sites that have less features!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like that I'm able to easily create pop-ups and emails campaigns in one place.  I have used other sites that were more expensive and had less features than Omnisend so I switched over.  The other site I was using didn't offer the SMS option, didn't directly connect to my site, and didn't include the ability to add pop-ups and forms to my site (which was easy to do).  I also like that I'm able to easily create email campaigns without having to be knowledgeable about HTML.  I'm able to add products easily and their free templates are great!  My email campaigns look a lot more professional and cleaner than what I was using previously.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I dislike the way you have to pay for the SMS feature.  I really wish you didn't have to pay per usage, and instead you could pay a set fee for up to a certain number of SMS contacts per month.  The feature for building a form was a bit confusing at first, but the video tutorials did help.  Because it was a bit difficult at first, I put it off for a while.  It would be better to have the ability to create a pop-up and create the workflow for it all in one place.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
For others thinking of using Omnisend, I would say go for it!  There's a free 7-day trial which was great because I was able to try it out and wasn't charged for use until I was ready.  Also, compare the features of Omnisend with others and you'll find that Omnisend offers a lot more than other companies who charge more.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend has helped me reach customers better and easily tailor my email campaigns with a lot of options that I don't have to be a HTML expert to use.  The ability to create email campaigns that directly relate to my site and can directly send customers to my site through adding products makes my life so much easier!  We also had been wanting to add pop-up e-mail sign-ups to our site and weren't able to do it in the past, but are able to with Omnisend. Using Omnisend has definitely helped us to create a more streamlined and tailored way to reach customers who access our site and are part of our email list.

all_reviews.review_title: A Humble yet powerful email marketing and customer management tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend is cost-effective, it is one of those email service which is priced really nicely. And at top of all, it has the best customer support team in the universe, so prompt that it is unbelievable. Their follow up is something I would like to adopt myself for my eCommerce customers. Intercom being their chat support app is again a good thing to have. Even for the smallest of problems, the follow up and emails are on point. Very good emailing service for starters

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Very poor colour scheme, limited features, as compared to Klaviyo and Mail Chimp, very basic templates, the UI needs a lot of improvement. Option to make customer opt for weekly, daily etc emails in marketing should be given as an option. More functionality in Live View is required. More options to edit in the email content creation needs to be done. A lot of feedback has been given already via chat to their customer care executives already. Also, system has glitches which are still unresolved and the team needs to fix that too. Database update is poor, suppose I change information in Shopify, it makes a new customer here, and there is no back sync of data between Omnisend and Shopify which needs to be fixed. Automation service needs to be improved

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Well, it is amazing for starters (like me). And one should really look into all the features to understand everything and then use it to extract the most out of it.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have sorted out my customer base with their advanced segmentation tools which is amazing. Abandoned cart series, welcome email series, campaigns: they are all nicely managed with Omnisend. One good thing is their live view feature which gives a lot of insight about what customer is seeing

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend is great, easy to use email client
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend offers us the ability to upload a large quantity of contacts to our account and create in-depth automation workflows at a low cost. For our business, having the ability to retargeting job seekers via email on a consistent basis has been a game changer for our team.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Some of the workflow features aren't as in-depth as I hoped. For example, we do a daily contact upload and there is not an option to enroll individuals in a workflow based on what they call tags. Individuals can only be enrolled via segments. This causes us to have to recreate our automation on a daily basis. Outside of this, the platform is great.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to quickly and easily target our partial complete applicants on our application and have seen an increased conversion of people applying since having moved to the Omnisend platform.

all_reviews.review_title: Good ESP solution for Shopify, Integrations are lacking
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Really great plug and play solution for Shopify  businesses needing an ESP that integrates well with the platform. Really like their easy "Campaign Boost" solution that re-sends to customers that left your message unopened. The product picker solution is also great. The ease of use is the primary reason to get it, IMO.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Integrations are pretty severely lacking. Most likely since they are a smaller player and integrations with other Shopify apps aren't a priority. A little disappointed with the design templates. Finally, I was a little disappointed with the amount of text support and how tedious it was to make sure I was compliant and was able to send SMS messages to my customers that had clearly opted in to receive text messages. It took about an afternoon to get everything figured out and I completed all the steps, but it wasn't what I was looking for. Not something their customer success could help with, just a product issue.

I wouldn't say that it is necessarily the easiest option for an ESP since I didn't try any others. I think a more robust SMS/MMS functionality is a must since right now they don't have something that is super easy to use.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Make sure to determine whether design, integrations and text capability are super important to you or not. I wish I would have evaluated that.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helps easily build out email and text automations with my customers and leads. Also segmenting leads and customers into meaningful groups to communicate segmented offers.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy user friendly interface (layout), Great analytics!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omisend is user friendly, beautifully designed, and it's easy to navigate than some other email platforms I've used. I also like the analytics and reporting. The automation templates are helpful to get you started and the newsletter pop-up forms are not just easy to use but look modern. However, the search for better reports without upgrading like crazy was helpful in making my decision to switch.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I've only been using Omnisend for a short amount of time and so far I haven't found a dislike yet. I've heard about it and was hesitant to switch over and start all over with a new service, but the free trial helped me decide that it was right.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I like that I'm able to send more emails a month and SMS texts for a lesser cost than the platform I switched from. My previous email provider didn't provide the reports that I needed and Omnisend does. There are also a lot of demos on how to use a  function to easily help you right away. Being that this email service is easy to use as well as beautifully aesthetic, I get excited about using it.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The automation emails are simple to use and the instructions are clear. I am able to customize to my liking and it syncs well with Shopify. The how to guides are easy to follow and allow me to fulfill my email marketing goals.

Although I have not used, I  enjoy the chance to use A/B testing to determine the right message to send going forward.

I enjoy reading the analytics to see who opened what email, location of potential customers (who is clicking on my website and how far they get before clicking out and/or purchasing). I am able to see what sales were made from which email campaign (curated emails). I am also able to see what device is being used when customers open my emails, helping me to create emails that are aesthetically appeasing to the type of device used.

Lastly, it allows you to see your growth overtime. For example, month to month I am able to view my audience growth and sales from Shopify.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I have not experienced any dislikes as of yet. I do know there are cheaper options available, but you get what you pay for and this is top notch!

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I recommend reading the help guides. They are very useful and offer step by step instructions on how to use the features in the software.

Also do not be afraid to create your own template and customize to your liking.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am able to use email marketing to target customers based on their product interest, idol time, abandonment, etc. I love the benefit of auto generated discounts which has a cut off date so that customers are not sitting on a discount offer.

I like that the automation features are really easy to setup. Even a complete beginner like me can set up an automated workflow in minutes. I like that I can easily set up my brand image through the logo and footer settings.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Sometimes I find the site a little difficult to navigate through in order to get the information I'm looking for. I would like an analytics screens that's a little friendlier to look at. Also would like if I got an email at the end of the day letting me know how many people subscribed to the newsletter everyday. That would be helpful.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I think that this app is really good for businesses of any size. Most money is made through remarketing through email, and has some of the best ROI in marketing. Using an app like this is one of the easiest ways to boost sales, strengthen your brand and increase customer retention. If you're not using an email remarketing app, you should really consider getting one.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I needed a way to send automated emails for things like cart recovery and up sell so this worked perfectly for that. Haven't had a lot of sales yet so it's hard to speak on the benefits realized.

all_reviews.review_title: Having more time means having a shorter learning curve
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
My favorite feature is Chat because getting instant help via Chat helps you learn your way through the system and keeps you hands on and sharp on your learning curve. Chat is a very important feature because instant help reinforces learning. If I get stuck, I can pose my question to Chat and get an answer within a few minutes. Often it is just that extra push that makes everything click together. Often, my helpers on Chat have given me tips on how to make my signup forms and landing pages more stylish. I really appreciate these tips as this also helps me learn better how to use the system.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Sometimes it is not all that apparent how features fit together and how to navigate them together into something usable. Therefore Chat is a very important feature because instant help reinforces learning. If I get stuck, I can pose my question to Chat and get an answer within a few minutes. Often it is just that extra push that makes everything click together.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I highly recommend Omnisend as have tried other mail campaign services, but they failed to offer the ease of a campaign, with a sign up form, follow up, automatically updating my customer data, and keeping my campaigns  stylish and me informed.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I want customers to fill out a form, thus giving me their data and permission to use it to contact them in the future. Important is that Omnisend collects that data and automatically adds it to my client list. No manually data harvesting necessary. This has been a huge benefit towards growing my business. I tried other services and found myself having to manually add data to my mailing list. If this were thousands the task would be ridiculously too much.

all_reviews.review_title: Technically Sound marketing platform. Future implementation of features could land Omnisend on top
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Easy to understand, ease of use, and navigation. Phenomenal customer service by a fast, responsive and friendly team.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Missing specific customizable features such as some auto-apply discount links, specific analytics like live/unrecoverable abandoned carts.. MMS prices are kind of high and email blocks and editing does seem frustratingly limited at times. I am not a fan of their forms at all. some features actually seem to deter email opt-ins such as oversized forms, forms that do not show up completely on mobile or allow you to further customize them without the use of HTML code

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Consider how highly you rely on email marketing as a source of revenue and whether that depends on extensive customization or more straightforward features. Most beginners to intermediate users will find Omnisend easy to use and meet all their demands. Those looking for advanced features and customization that take into account even small variables might find some features missing.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend helps me keep in contact with prospects who have not yet purchased my products. Have yet to see any conversions but email marketing is too complex to attribute to one variable. Omnisend's automation and workflow make it easy to automate communication between subscribers

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend Review from Native Hemp Company
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
What we like best with omnisend is the UX design and the consistency in the delivery to all our emial subscribers. Finding a company that has been consistent in delivery to all our subscribers is very important to us and something that we have struggled with. Omnisend has yet to let us down and for that we are super thankful. I really like the ease of inserting pictures and i love that they store a bank of pictures that we can reuse anytime we want That has been very helpful to bring up old graphics and information that we have told our customers.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
What we dislike with omnisend is the lack of available templates to use when crafting an email. We would like more options to choose from. I think stats could be a little better because the stats that omnisend sends us is not consistent to what our shopify store tells us.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you are looking for a email marketing platform that easily integrates with shopify omnisend is a great option. Omnisend email templates are easy to use and build out pretty custom templates. Omnisend has been consistent in delivering our emails to all our subscribers every time which is exactly what you want from a email marketing platform.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
The problems that we are solving is reaching our customers with informative information and sales. The benefits we have realized is sales and consistent delivery which has been awesome. The other problems that we are solving are insights and feedback from our customers. Our customers like to hear from us more than just sales so omnisend lets us connect with our customers on a more personal level. This allows us to understand our customer base better and better cater our sales, products and service to them to bring them the highest quality product we can.

all_reviews.review_title: Robust and Easy to Use Email Marketing/Marketing Automation Solution for SMBs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Intuitive interface makes it easy to set up and start sending key streams of automated emails to keep customers engaged and returning.

Predefined automation flows make sense for retail but can be easily tailored to your vertical. Popular automations include Birthday, Re-engagement, Thank You's, Rate your experience, and reviews.

Supports SMS (which I don't use yet)

Campaigns can be set up to cross promote on Facebook

Email templates are easy to build. There are pre-built templates and themed templates

I like the Booster option for each campaign

I like how easy it is to A/B test emails

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The email template catalog could include a greater selection of options. The selection of themed templates are also limited, and frankly, not that exciting

Better options for branding are welcome

Audience segmentation is not intuitive and not as flexible as I would like. For example, if I create a segment, I want to be able to suppress certain emails from that segment on an individual basis without have to create a new segment.

the Boolean feature should support more granularity with the and/or function

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automations with Omnisend have saved me a lot of time. And I'm able to see how much each stream is generating income. The intuitiveness of the platform would make it easy for most to get started on a robust marketing program to drive sales. No coding is required.

I easily set up campaigns and auto emails/forms. The customer support is quick to respond and they are very helpful! I love that I can coordinate emails and texts because sometimes the client will not see the email but they, almost with certainty, will receive their text messages. Changes are easily made. All of the emails are customizable to fit your business and the content that you are wanting to get out. Omnisend makes is SO easy to take the customers through the buying process by setting up the timeline of emails to take them through every stage of the buying process. Not every email has to be about sales! Use this to inform clients of cool tips, educate them, introduce yourself, or any other communication you think is relevant to your customer. I also like that I was able to set up an email and text combo to provide a way for my current subscribers to share my link with others!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I'm a new user and as of right now, I have no dislikes. I would like the ability to set up FB ads through this app as well so I can integrate with emails I am already sending out and do it all from one app instead of having multiple apps to monitor. Oh, I would also like follow up that the emails are going out - at least for now while I am a new business. I am always so paranoid that the customers are getting the emails they need to - order confirmation, thank you, shipping.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
You don't need another auto email app. Take the time to set up your campaigns and update every few weeks if you want! Take advantage of the SMS text as well. Personally, as long as I am not overloaded with texts, I like getting texts better because my emails can get lost sometimes. Make sure to use catchy taglines! I recommend that you start out small while you pick up business. I will definitely be upgrading as my business grows.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I don't have to worry about keeping up with communications from new orders to shipping and new products on my store or sales!

all_reviews.review_title: I like the features but they don't always deliver as promised. Customer Support is great.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like the thoughtful features, easy audience segmentation, suggestions for campaigns, templates, and overall ease of use. I like the fast customer support.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I find it is expensive for small business. The sales reporting is slightly inaccurate (like all platforms) it accounts for sales that weren't connected to campaigns, for example, I invoiced a customer through shopify and the campaign counted it as a sale generated. If you need to make an edit to a Boosted campaign (a second campaign that sends to those who didn't open the first email after 46 hours) it's super clunky and you lose that automation and have to build your own segmented audience. Easy but also easy to screw up.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Definitely the easiest and most thoughtful platform I've used yet, compared to mailchimp, Hubspot and Shopify email.  Way more pros than cons. Anything that isn't perfected is being worked on as I can tell there are constant improvements.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
It connects really well to Shopify since Mailchimp no longer does. I'm able to get comms out to customers WAY faster than I could with Mailchimp. It's incredibly user-friendly. I like that they seem to be ahead of SMS automation so I can roll that out soon!

If you need to make an edit to a Boosted campaign (a second campaign that sends to those who didn't open the first email after 46 hours) it's super clunky and you lose that automation and have to build your own segmented audience. Easy but also easy to screw up.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like the dashboard and how easy it is to see the number of new email and SMS subscribers as well as the sources of revenue, whether from Omnisend or other places.

I also enjoy the heat map feature so I can easily see which links people are clicking on within my email messages.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Some of the email content editing features are a bit limited though they generally work well enough for my needs. It would be nice to be able to edit the HTML for the emails for formatting purposes instead of needing to rely on the pre-made drag and drop content boxes.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I use Omnisend to create a closer relationship with my email subscribers by sending them personal thank you messages and sending out specific announcement campaigns. I haven't seen much revenue yet because of these efforts, but the reporting is very helpful in terms of understanding the impact my messages are having. I especially like the heat map feature so I can see which links people are clicking on in my emails.

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend Broad Mail Marketing with Effective Analysis !!!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
This platform is a platform that allows you to carry out automated marketing to improve and increase the growth of your brand, it also works with all email platforms such as WooCommerce, Bigcommerce among others. You will be able to communicate with clients and establish a constant interaction, you will be able to carry out and configure campaigns easily through email and thus obtain a greater reach of potential clients and user acquisition.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
We have not had problems with this platform, our experience has been satisfactory although if they should add more templates to carry out more personalized campaigns, this does not mean that it is a bad platform, quite the opposite. It could be so much better than it is.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
This is a good option for marketing automation for any company, it is easy to use, its interface is clean and organized, it also provides functions and tools to create solid campaigns and increase customer acquisition and increases in sales, fluidity of work. in the work team and saving time. fully recommended.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used Omnisend to create an automated email system, this has improved our administration and marketing management and our campaigns. We had a significant reach of clients in a short time and our sales as well as profits increased more than we imagined, it really is an essential tool for any online sales company. We create newsletters to keep all our clients informed, it is easy to configure. Our workforce saves a lot of time and has a work fluency that did not exist before, we made a good decision when choosing this platform.

all_reviews.review_title: If you need to switch platforms as you grow know that this will be hardest part of migration
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Easy to understand and use for someone starting from scratch

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
If you need to move platforms as you grow  (I moved from wordpress to shopify) know that it will be like starting over. They do not provide a migration tool at all. You will need to recreate:

all your emails
automations
export and import audiences with mapping
you will lose your entire photo library and need to upload them all over again
any templates are lost and must be recreated
all forms recreated from scratch

You will be unable to use your send from email because they consider it used already. It will take at least two days of messaging to get that resolved with their customer service.

Their customer service sends canned responses that don't help and you will feel frustrated not only with the mountain of a task of recreating everything but also with how incredibly unhelpful customer service is in even understanding basic questions.

I am still staying with omnisend because its a system I already know but hoping this will help someone else out when making their decision so its not a surprise.

Happy entreprenuering!!

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you might grow enough to switch platforms dont use omnisend

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
It sends newsletters - nothing different than anyone else

all_reviews.review_title: Best email marketing system I've found so far
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
This email marketing platform integrates perfectly with Shopify. I like how I can give customers exclusive individual discount codes without having to worry about it being spread around to other customers. Huge upgrade from MailChimp that wants to charge for this feature

Scheduling emails is super easy

Customer service is quick and easy. Sometimes there are miscommunications, so when I ask about something, they'll give me an answer for something unrelated. Other than that, I think they're helpful for the most part

Purchase tracking is a great feature that I didn't think I would need.

Workflows, landing pages, and forms are my favorite features

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Navigation is difficult, especially for first-time users. I'm fine with learning curves, so it wasn't too much of a nuisance but I wish it were easier to navigate. Some language used on the platform is also difficult to comprehend, I find myself running to the FAQs and forums section often.

When I send test emails to myself, sometimes they won't come in until the next day. Which is super annoying, especially if I have something scheduled for the same day.

Not very mobile friendly.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Customer service is great to work with and have patience

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Targeting, maximizing conversions with workflows, and communicating with my audience

all_reviews.review_title: Great integration but poor technical offerings
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
It's extremely well integrated with Shopify, and everything syncs up together much better than competitior services like Mailchimp where I've experienced a lot of sync issues.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Pretty much all my emails get automatically flagged as spam or promotion. This is software-specific, because the same thing with the same emails does not happen with Mailchimp and Hubspot. As a result, the open/click rates on Omnisend are materially lower than that of the competitor services we've used.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Take a look at Mailchimp - if you go with omnisend you will get more accurate data tracking but at the cost of a weaker email delivery system.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend integrates very well with our e-commerce shop on Shopify, and it has many templates that you can choose from - definitely takes away some design burden.

all_reviews.review_title: Exceptional design and UI, not as many automation features as Mail Chimp
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I love the ease of use. It is simple to set up and the prompts to move you from one campaign to another and further the development of your business is effortless and very helpful for a newbie like myself

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I didn't like getting the rug pulled out on the "paid features" after the trial. I was barely started, it took me time to create them, and they were ended with a prompt to pay. I wasn't aware this was going to happen and I was soured on your company as a result. I spent a week telling people about how great your app was, how it was going to help my business grow, and how the service turns to paid features at scale. I have moved to a paid account now. I sill like the intuitive design and ease of use.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Paid features are worth it if you are to scale, otherwise use other free services (if available on your sales platform) to get you there. Omnisend is very user friendly and the design is intuitive. Free features are limited compared to others in the industry, but paid features and UI are superior.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm a one person team trying to get this up and running. The professional templates and atomization are a huge help to get me to a point where I could justify paying for your service. I tried to switch to MailChimp just as Shopify was dropping their integration with them, so I had to return to Omnisend. I'm overall satisfied with their product, just wish they had a longer runway for start-ups to gain a following and begin paying only once they reached scale.

all_reviews.review_title: Make your marketing life just a little bit easier.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
What I enjoy the most is the ability to automate my messages to my new subscribers as well as my abandoned carts. I find being in front of people makes the difference. I also like the simplicity of the dashboard, showing me all the metrics in one area. Most other platforms I have used in the past have always made the report viewing complicated that you never ended up using it. This I can show to the board of directors easily.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Honestly, I have not found something that I actively dislike. I had an issue with some of the forms, in the beginning, I could not work out how to successfully get them to show correctly on my site, but I consulted the FAQ's and they helped me get them working properly.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Make sure that you take advantage of the free trial so that you can see if it is a system you would be willing to use.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have realised that the ability to connect with our customer base is a lot more powerful than anything we had done before with previous shopping platforms, I also enjoy how easily the sync. The only problem I am having (I think it has a lot more to do with me that it does with Omnisend, is the fact that my abandon cart emails are not converting, that might have something to do with format that I am sending them out in, but that is something for me to work on. I am also working on utilising the forms more on our site.

I like how simple it is to build a workflow and how well it integrates with my shopify store

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I havent found any yet. I wish there was a built in preset form to use for "notify me when in stock". For example, when an item is out of stock, the customer would press "notify me when in stock" and a form from omnisend will appear. Omnisend would log the customer email and know which product they were viewing, and then when the item comes back in stock it would email them automatically.

Note: I think this functionality is available (havent tried yet), i just wish it was prebuilt like abandoned cart emails and welcome emails, etc

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
it works well with shopify

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We didnt have email marketing prior to omnisend outside of default shopify emails. Now we are taking our email marketing to the next level allowing us to capture new customers and reengage preexisting customers

all_reviews.review_title: Using Omnisend has been a positive experience. There was no frustration in figuring out how to use.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I was using another email provider and was very frustrated in trying to figure out how to use, after three months I switched to omnisend. The transition and migrating my customer was so easy. I figured out how to do a landing page in seconds. It has been pleasurable working on omnisend. I should have just started out with them to begin with.  There is no complicated terminology and guessing about what to do next. It is easy to set up campaigns. There is plenty of videos and support when I have a question. The solutions are easy to understand and implement. I would encourage people looking for a good email provider to try omnisend. I look forward to grow my email list and working with omnisend. I heard so many positive reviews from other friends who own their business. I like the options that omnisend has for the paid version.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
So far I can't complain and there are no dislikes. I'm hoping if I do come across a dislike there will be a positive solution to the problem.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I would definitely recommend Omnisend for anyone who is looking for an email provider. It is easy to maneuver and understand plus there is plenty of support when needed. I would suggest not to look around. They can always try the free version before making a committment.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I was able to understand how to do a landing page and how easy it is to send out campaigns. The migrating customers from my previous email provider to Omnisend was so easy which I thought would be possible difficult but they all transferred which was one less burden to worry about. My nurturing series will be easier than my previous provider. I feel confident that I will be able to accomplish what needs to been done to make my business successful with Omnisend. I would recommend Omnisend for the first time email subscriber.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend has been a great help for us. We went from struggling with another service to being able to build up all sorts of things we desperately needed right away. From an automated cart abandonment email series that integrated custom discount codes to regular email updates, building up a cohesive flow of emails that all match each other and are effective has been super simple.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There's definitely some language and design issues that aren't as well designed or put together as I'd like to see. The pre-built copy is pretty simple to fix if you're comfortable with that kind of thing, but can be a little stilted and rough if that's something you don't want to deal with. The design side of things has been a little harder than I was hoping for as someone who isn't great with design, but it's pretty customizable and easy to edit.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Do your research, check out the competitors, figure out what you need in a service and what you're not getting now.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Implementing Omnisend has made is much easier to contact new and existing subscribers and customers. Unlike our previous system of cobbled together email programs, Omnisend has it all streamlined, easy to compile, and implements in seconds. They even helped figure out a potential conflict with Shopify and showed us how to work through it. We're seeing an engagement increase with our automated emails and an uptick in purchasing habits from our existing subscriber list.

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend delivers and fulfills all my campaign needs!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I was a Mailchimp user and I always had trouble formatting my email campaigners to look great for my customers. In addition data and email results were never accurate. No problem with Omnisend!

I tried the free trail and was hooked. Easy to setup and interstate with my Shopify store and apps. I loved that they offer premise themes for emails too! Just select and Fill it in with your personal touch with photos and easy color edits.

In addition to east beautiful email templates, they include free email boosts to make sure your unopened campaigns gets opened. I have way more open success rate than I have ever had with MailChimp. I went from 18% with Mailchimp to 40%! My online shop is growing with orders each week.

For a one woman show that I am, I need programs that are user friendly and easy, doesn't take too much of my time and gets the job down. Omnisend delivers and fulfills all my campaign needs and I definitely recommend it to anyone who is a small business and needs overall growth in online presence.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
You pricing can increase if your email lists increases but not the list that accepts marketing which is confusing. I have 3,000 + on my list but only 1,985 accepts marketing. I still had to upgrade to continue the service. It's okay since I have increased subscribers since I've switched programs, seeing about 3-7 new members per week.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Try the free trial and send 1 campaign to see for yourself! You'll be surprised the clicks you achieve that you didn't before.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
No problems, the benefits are the user friendly service. It's so easy and haven't even had to contact customer service, been able to figure it out on my own. They have info and help links available to wall you through.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
What I like best about Omnisend are the multi-channel automation (email, text, A/B splits etc) and the brilliant, easy to deploy sign up forms. The system is allowing our company to quickly identify segments of our audience to better target them with the right product. This is producing more engagement & in turn, sales. The templates we have used to create the automation were so easy to brand using our own imagery and logos. The A/B split also enables us to compare ideas and allow real life results didtate the direction of communication with our audience, Overall, I am confident Omnisend is the best overall email automation and marketing platform we have worked with, We will 100% be upgrading our free trial to one of the plans offered.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
After using Omnisend everyday during the free trial, I have not find anything I dislike. If I was obligated to mention something, I would say I would like the facebook integration to be part of the standard plan instead of only being available in the Pro Plan. It would also be useful for the opt-in policies to be a little shorter than they are. They end up using up so much space at the bottom of our forms which can look messy. There is not much to dislike at this stage, we have been happy with the overall product.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
My recommendations to anyone looking for a email automation/marketing system is to give Omnisend a try during the free period. Have a plan before signing up and start using it from day 1. Track your progress and see what works within your organisation. I'm sure you'll soon come to the same conclusion as us, its the best system out there.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend is helping our company free up time. Enabling our small team to be more productive with the time it does have. By solving this problem, Omnisend is helping us correctly targeting the right audience with the right products. It is allowing our company to better engage with clients. This engagement has been converting in an increase in social media followers and overall brand engagement. We are excited to see how this engagement converts in the long-term when applying it to a much greater number of followers. It seems that developing "Raving-Fans" will be made easier with the help of Omnisend.

all_reviews.review_title: User friendly, beautiful email campaigns and automation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The seamless integration with Shopify makes creating email campaigns and automation a breeze. The analytics make it easy to analyze every aspect of each email to better understand what is most effective, and how to improve the next campaign.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I wish that the Yotpo integration allowed us to send the initial review request email directly from Omnisend so that we'd be able to customize the email more than Yotpo's app allows.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I encourage other users to give Omnisend a try. Test out all of the different features and create several versions of your first automation campaign to learn the many capabilities and options within the software. Omnisend's help pages are a great resource as well if anything comes up that you're unable to implement correctly.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend's automation is an incredible time saver, and allows for better customization over Shopify's standard automated emails.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Omnisend?
review_question_answers.answer: The seamless integration with Shopify makes creating email campaigns and automation a breeze. The analytics make it easy to analyze every aspect of each email to better understand what is most effective, and how to improve the next campaign.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Omnisend?
review_question_answers.answer: I wish that the Yotpo integration allowed us to send the initial review request email directly from Omnisend so that we'd be able to customize the email more than Yotpo's app allows.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
review_question_answers.answer: I encourage other users to give Omnisend a try. Test out all of the different features and create several versions of your first automation campaign to learn the many capabilities and options within the software. Omnisend's help pages are a great resource as well if anything comes up that you're unable to implement correctly.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: Omnisend's automation is an incredible time saver, and allows for better customization over Shopify's standard automated emails.

all_reviews.review_title: Intuitive, great functionality and good pricing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The ability to segment your list is vital, and Omnisend allows you to do that easily.  By linking to your store (which is easy - we use Woocommerce), you can segment based on what people bought, when they bought, and a lot more that I haven't explored yet but plan to.
Creating a campaign email is easy, intuitive and the ability to save common elements for future emails is great.  The most valuable feature is being able to quickly and easily add products from your store to your email, with just a few clicks.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There is nothing not to like.  I haven't had to use their support, so can't comment on that (but not having to use it is a good thing).

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have finally found an email marketing service that is priced affordably for us as a small business and has time-saving and powerful functionality.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Nothing thus far. Everything seems to be working fine, and if I encounter any issues, it seems like they will be quick to help me solve my problems.

If you're looking for an efficient and beautiful program for sending emails to your customers, omni should be your first choice!

all_reviews.review_title: Simple Easy To Use Email Automation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
How simple the platform is there isn't too much going on and it helps with setting up effective email sequences. This is my first time using email marketing properly and I came from MailChimp because they had banned my account for no specific reason. I have heard about how effective email marketing can be and this provider has made it easy to begin making simple sequences however I can see that there is plenty of room fo me to get more complex sequences once I learn more.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
That changes to automation sequences only go out to new participants of the list.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Learning how to use email marketing and the benefits I've realized is that I am creating my own list that can be super valuable in the future if i continue to nurture them. And all it takes is one time set up process

all_reviews.review_title: a game changer for automated emails
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I currently use Omnisend and have been using it for quite some time now for our fitness business. Simply, I love the customized emails for each individual product purchase. Especially since so many things have turned virtual (subscriptions, workouts, memberships, etc) and to be able to create a custom email with passwords and login information is so helpful. The other thing I absolutely love is the analytics of seeing how much revenue you made from your auto emails.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I just wish I could use Omnisend on other areas of the internet. Maybe I can but I haven't explored that yet. Also, sometimes the UX of customizing an email seems confusing. Could be streamlined a little bit.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
It is a game changer! You will not be disappointed and the opportunities are endless to expand your business.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're solving issues of product specific emails. We're able to insert links and downloads and passwords when a customer purchases a specific item and we've never been able to do that before. It has expanded our opportunities.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend is an all-in-one email marketing automation platform that helps our company to make more sales! It can create personalized emails in minutes and automate your email marketing. It's segmentation tools helps us to target customers with relevant email messages to earn more revenue! The app integration with Shopify is what appealed most helpful towards our company since our eCommerce website is based on Shopify. Getting support in a timely and sufficient manner is also another great plus!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Omnisend's email formatting can be weird on mobile sometimes! Order confirmation and automation emails aren't delivered on time for some of the emails. Not all my emails go to my customers and sometimes complain that our Omnisend email goes to their junk mail. Not very pleased with the automation emails where some blocks are not removable or changeable. I wish it can be more flexible with the blocks and automation email templates.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
We have used Omnisend for many tasks and we would love to recommend to any other eCommerce company out there to use Ominsend as their marketing tools. It will help the company to understand its customers better and their needs better.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to customize cancellation/shipping/order confirmation emails! We are able to target a specific group of customers based on their shopping and browsing behaviors. It's been used to track clicks and browsing behavior on our website to better key into what our customers like want and need.

all_reviews.review_title: Simple to Implement and Responsive Tech Support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Very easy to set up and integrate with BigCommerce. Support has been superb and very responsive, and also good at following up with issues.

The automation workflow setup is intuitive and very easy to use - creates nice templates also. Pretty easy and quick to set up the templates

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The abandoned cart feature is far from optimal when using with BigCommerce - more like an abandoned checkout rather than a true abandoned cart, as the email is only triggered when a customer gets to the payment button.

In the abandoned cart email, the button will only bring you to the filled abandoned cart if using the same device. Moving to another device, even if logged into account, will result in an empty cart rather than filled cart.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Worth signing up to the Trial Version and evaluate whether it is suitable for you, and find out what the good things and potential gaps are. I have found this very valuable. The contact with tech support also means that I have an idea of the standard of "after-care" service I will deal with in future. Price is competitive compared to Klaviyo (which was one system I evaluated before Omnisend).

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Wanting a better email marketing tool and managing subscribers and segmenting them etc. So far, it seems to be OK and doing what I want in that sense.

Also want a system that integrates better with my eCommerce platform (BigCommerce)

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I love being able to automatically manage abandoned carts, following a very detailed workflow.
I also like the reporting system, very detailed.
Customer support is very reacting and helpful.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There are no particular aspects of the application that I don't like. I would like to try the push notifications feature if the price were a little lower. For us it is currently out of reach, also because not knowing the return on investment of this function, having never used it before, we are unable to establish whether or not it is an investment necessary for our business.
So if you really have to find a negative aspect, I would say that the price for activating push notifications is a bit high. Nothing else for the moment.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I would highly recommend using Omnisend to other users especially for the possibility of creating an optimized workflow for sending email reminders to abandoned checkouts. I have yet to experiment with the other features but I am sure that they will also be fully satisfactory.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Having set up a detailed workflow for sending emails to abandoned checkouts, I have the opportunity to understand what is the type of email that makes customers more responsive.
I also like the reporting system, very detailed. I use it a lot to check how my campaigns are working and where I should work to get the best result possible.
I find it very useful it's ability to generate an automatic coupon to incentivize users to end the payment process. The fact that coupons have a deadline is certainly useful in order to create urgency and greater number of interactions.
I have found a higher rate of return to the site from customers who have left the checkout, and I am confident that this will certainly lead to an increase in the recovery rate of abandoned carts in the future.
For the moment I can say that I love every aspect of this application. I contacted customer support via chat and they were very quick to offer me support and answer my questions.

all_reviews.review_title: OMNISEND Is The Best Way to Market in E-mails and SMS.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I love how easy it is to use the design interface.  There are a lot of things you can do with the templates they provide, and I've had hardly any trouble making things come out the way I want.  It's super easy to navigate the site and get things setup for your website.  I also love how omnisend offers tons of analytics, stats, and numbers to look at and build from.  The website is also very sound and it doesn't lag, it runs very smoothly.  I love how I can integrate omnisend into my Shopify website so easily.  It helps me keep everything together in one place.  I've used other companies for e-mail and SMS marketing, and I can honestly say Omnisend was way easier to use.  I have been using Omnisend for a couple months now, and I plan to continue using it for the duration of my business.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There is hardly anything that I dislike.  The only thing I can think of, off the top of my head, is that I have to pay! Haha, it would be awesome to use this service for free.  But, all jokes aside, even their pricing is very affordable, they even adjust pricing to the audience you have!

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I recommend using Omnisend for all of your e-mail/sms marketing.  The website is easy to use, easy to integrate, and they provide a lot of information and analytics. You can definitely market well for your business with the free version of Omnisend.  Which is a great thing, especially since entrepreneurship is on the rise, and a lot of young people don't have much capital at first to get all of these things going. If you're looking for a way to start marketing to your customers via email or sms, you should definitely try Omnisend. This is my advice to you.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am implementing email marketing into my business model. It's helping me reach more people, and it enables me to look at analytics and demographics.  Overall I am becoming more business minded because of omnisend.

all_reviews.review_title: A great and suitable service for our e-commerce store emails, ideally used for email automation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The best thing about Omnisend is its deep analytics on users, especially the live view which shows various insights by filtering based on products viewed, carts viewed etc. by both the known and anonymous customers. Since my e-commerce store is built on Shopify, this app suits our needs and offers the relevant information we need to target our customers. Its automation feature is the best for me to save the time and labour for sending emails to every customer segments separately.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Haven't used it enough to find any hindrance so far, but the standard plan could be a bit more affordable or allow more than 500 emails.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you are looking for a service that makes easy, interactive and variety of emails for your growing business, then Omnisend is your best choice. It can easily be used by anyone including people with no prior experience in email marketing. Its analytics will offer you the right insights needed for your business (especially if it is an e-commerce one) and the automation feature is ideal for reaching the growing traffic of customers.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I find very easy to reach my increasing number of customers, and the different categories of them (abandoned checkouts, existing customers, new customers etc.)  Its integration with Shopify has a lot of pros for my e-commerce website. My email open rates also increased considerably during the free trial period.

Haven't found anything yet that I am unsatisfied with at this time.

I've learned that streamlining the process to touch base with customers is insanely valuable and by doing so it enables me to focus on other things that help my business. I've realized that E-mail marketing doesn't have to be so hard and time consuming!

all_reviews.review_title: Have only been using it for less than a year but am extremely satisfied so far with it.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like how Omnisend really walks you through how to create all of the automations / workflows and also gives you suggestions of workflows that would be helpful specifically for our business. I also find the dashboard to be very user friendly which is extremely important for me.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I do wish that there was a bit more in terms of design customization. I am a graphic designer so customization is definitely something I value more than the average person. Instead I have to design my emails in photoshop first and then import as images.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
When I started using Omnisend, I joined a video tutorial group offered by Omnisend that helped walk me through setting up standard automations and workflows. This was extremely helpful because I was able to ask questions and learn from an expert instead of spending hours trial and error.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have definitely grown our subscriber list substantially since we switched over to Omnisend. We have also been able to target back a ton of abandoned carts that we were not able to retrieve when we were using Mailchimp. We are also doing a lot more automations in general that weren't available to us before.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing Automation for ny Shopify Based Site!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
They have a very nice and clean User Experience to set up what you need, and their Customer Service everytime has been very fats, responsive, and incredibly pleasant. I also have found that the suite of features is VERY robust!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I really can't say there is any downside.  I think when it comes to Email Marketing + Automation for Websites built on the Shopify Platform, it is a 2 Horse Race between OMNISEND vs. KLAVIYO.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I highly recommend giving these guys a very serious and in-depth look!  They are VERY nice people and company with GREAT Customer Service, and truly a HUGE asset to any small business E-Commerce Website Platform that is looking for Automation help.

When it comes to Building FLOWS and just overall use, again, I cannot say enough good things about these guys, not only when it comes to their Product, but again as I have shared their Customer Service and getting back to me on a timely basis with the right answers that need.

They have MADE me tens of thousands of dollars with their Email Flow Automations that I have Built and left alone to run.

They 100% are a MUST look at and consider if you are built on Shopify.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am solving many of my Automation needs with OMNISEND, including:  Abandoned Cart, Birthday Mailings,Welcome Emails from signing up to our Newsletter, and Customer Reactivation,for those that have NOT ordered from us in awhile.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Very user-friendly and easy to navigate. It's is so easy to pull your leads that are collected from your website. At the push of one button, you can export all your leads into one spreadsheet. I also like setting up my campaigns through Omnisend. It is very user-friendly. Even if you have not set up a campaign before you are guided step by step with Omnisend. They offer the ideal reports for you to reference regarding your business. There is an option to create forms that are also very easy to make. You can see a live view of your website while you are working in Omnisend.  When a customer signs up on your website my thank you email is all automated through Omnisend. Plus if a customer makes a purchase they receive the thank you email from Omnisend. Everything is automated. You set it up once and that is all you need to do. So initially you have to craft up you initial emails to your website visitors but once it is set up you don't need to worry about it anymore.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I have not come across anything negative about using Omnisend

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you are considering using Omnisend go for it. it is easy to use and their support team is excellent. I have been with them for almost 4 years and I have never had an issue with them.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have one location where my new, current and previous leads are located

Very easy to create emails and add products. You can pick products right from the store and have them instantly added to the email so that subscribers can click the product right from the email and purchase very easily. I also like the reports that are available to view too. Options such as seeing a click map is amazing to measure what content is being acted on more than others. The ability to save templates is amazing too. Just drop and drag and it slides right in! What more could you ask for in a email service?

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The only downside I can think of is that they should work on customer support. I had a few problems with tech support early on when I started using the service. Since then, I haven't had any issues that I can think of at the moment. I would like the option to be able to be it more easy to save templates and information. So that it can be added whenever I would create new emails from scratch.

Must tray it out at least.

I have have feedback from my subscribers that say they love the emails and that they look amazing.
