all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
It connects with Shopify to be able to pull product image and title/description to be put into emails. It has integrations with lots of other softwares

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
It lacks the ability to pull in important customer information and order information that can be used in the automated email workflows. Even the information that it is able to pull cannot be used as part of segmentation to send personalised email to your database. What I found most surprising and disappointing was it doesn't even pull in the correct Order Numbers into the email. It creates its own order number which is different from the order number in Shopify so even trying to use it's Order Confirmation workflow is useless when it inserts order numbers into the email that is different to the order number in Shopify.  Sadly I will have to find another marketing automation software that is suited for eCommerce businesses.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Not ideal if you're an eCommerce business and if you require customer information and order information to be integrated correctly. Omnisend is not strong on data integration of customer data and order/sales data.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
None. I can't even get the the basic requirements I need.

The pricing is incredibly reasonable. And there is also a free plan for small lists, but the free plan doesn't have all of the additional features (like automated emails including cart abandonment.)

I found Omnisend when Mailchimp stopped its integration with Shopify last year. I compared a lot of different solutions at that time. Omnisend was definitely the best choice for the money!

Their rep walked me through all of the features on a demo call to make sure I understood how they all work and integrate with Shopify. I would definitely recommend scheduling a free demo call with them to see if it is a good fit for your business.

Nothing! It's a fantastic email platform.

Integration with Shopify.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: I don't have any issues with Omnisend and I've noticed what you're getting for the cost of each package and how this far outweighs what other email marketing brands tend to offer. Omnisend also integrates easily to my Shopify store which makes everything feel more cohesive and makes the management aspect easier.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
This is hard to narrow down, but the templates are stylish and easy to use.  Love how seamlessly Omnisend works with Shopify. The automated e-mails are also helpful. And unlike MailChimp, Omnisend helps set up pop-up forms without having to go through another app or site. I can't express how much Omnisend has helped me and my business partner with our marketing.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I haven't found a downside or something I dislike so far...honestly! Omnisend has everything I need, and things I didn't even know I needed! Everything is easy to use and does what its supposed to!

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Try it. Once you try it, you'll see there's no going back to another Ecommerce Marketing company. The ease of Omnisend and all of its capabilities make it a must for your online business, or any business really.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
The automated e-mails you can set up for empty carts, new subscribers and birthdays are so handy and elevate the stress of remembering to set up campaigns. We've been able to get more subscribers by using the pop-up form for sign ups.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The easy integration with Shopify Platform. It's so well integrated that we even have some buttons around the shopify platform that are directly connected to Omnisend, haven't seen a lot of other apps doing that. Also all the pre-built automations available are very helpful, you just need to select the one you want to use and it's basicaly done with the best templates, just need to make some adjustments for your own brand.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The need to pay even for a small number of contacts. At the beginning you have period of trial, but then if you don't pay, they completely stop sending all your e-mails and I have a problem with that because a lot of customers didn't receive orders confirmation during a period and I had a lot of complaints.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I recommend this tool for the ones who are using shopify. It's very easy to integrate with the shopify website and you can use its tools to keep in contact with all your new and old customers. It's very important to keep your company in contact with all the customers to improve the number of returning customers and Omnisend can help you do that.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
E-mail marketing, e-mail notifications and abandoned cart/product. It's easy to build new automation and new campaigns. This tool is very useful for marketing purposes, but as well to keep in contact with your customers. I even did some sales using its e-mails campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend: My #1 Rated Email Marketing Source
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I love the simplicity of Omnisend. When I use it, I know with confidence that I'm sending what needs to be sent! There is nothing better than sending out a mass email that didn't take too long to create, that does the job well. I love that the price is flexible and meets the users needs!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The only thing I would improve is the automation. I feel there should be more options. This isn't a huge issue, but I'm sure it would improve the experience! So far so good.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I highly recommend to try the free trial and see if Omnisend fits your needs. There is no harm to it as you will be able to cancel at any time. I can almost guarantee to anyone that by the time you're finished with the trial you'll be purchasing the plan that meets your needs. The best part? The price scales with your list size, making Omnisend extremely affordable and genuine!

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm solving many problems with Omnisend. It has helped me really use email marketing how it should be used, while also teaching me tons about my audience! The setup is clean, it's simple and it's truly helpful.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
It is very easy to navigate and there is help 24/7 if you need it

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I don't have much control over where the email campaigns go (a lot of them go into junk folders or are not seen)

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Omnisend has been super easy from the moment I started using it - especially because I had never used an email marketing program before.
Its all really straight forward, you can easily schedule campaigns and automation emails and there is help whenever you need it.
Omnisend also have reporting functions, a dashboard where you can see a snap shot of how your email marketing is advancing and a full report available for each individual campaign that is sent out.
When I integrated Omnisend with my shopify website I was able to see a live view of the visitors looking at the website, who the customer was if we had their details and what part of the website they were looking at.
There is also a page just for your audience which shows your email subscribers and how they have opted in.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am able to build a email list and audience, it is easy to do A/B email marketing to see which emails perform best, campaigns are easy to set up and you can draft them and come back to them later, I can see the analytics of the email campaigns to see how many are being opened, how many clicks they are receiving etc.

all_reviews.review_title: Functional, lower-cost option for Shopify email marketing automation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
As both an ecommerce marketing agency owner, and a Shopify store owner, I know how important email marketing automation is to maximizing sales & conversions. Omnisend offers a reasonably strong and sophisticated capability without the high price and complexity of competing apps.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Campaign creation is a little kludgy and confusing, and the documentation, training, and tutorials are relatively sparse.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Omnisend is an excellent choice for 'do-it-yourself' Shopify store owners who want to leverage email marketing automation but lack the time and/or resources for Klaviyo.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Maximizing online sales requires strong email marketing automation, but price & complexity can keep a store owner from taking full and proper advantage it. Omnisend makes it a little easier and more palatable to leverage the potential of effective email marketing.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
This is almost exactly like MailChimp so it was easy to integrate into our company. We love the ability to send out mass emails to our customers updating them on pre-orders, discounts, new products, and more. We frequently utilize the "copy campaign" function to keep all of our emails consistent with each other. The analytics are also awesome and we love looking at how many emails were opened and where the most clicks/sales came from.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The only thing I dislike is the audience function. It can be glitchy when it comes to creating segments and tagging people. Then, when you go to choose an audience for a campaign, you can't even choose a segment! You can only choose an audience group from an "import" that you did. So what's the point of segments then?

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are solving a lot of communication and customer service issues with Omnisend. We received feedback that we don't update our customers enough, so when we integrated Omnisend and were able to send out pre-order updates to everyone at once, our rating increased. This helps us stay in touch with our audience more and ensure customer satisfaction.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Design options. Customer support. Segments. Automation options etc. Omnisend really does offer a much better service than any other provider I have tried and their support is also amazing, always there to help and very responsive too.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Nothing. Everything has been great so far! I would have liked to have the option to add my domain without having to pay the one time fee of $89.99 but I understand that this is business and it's just something I will have to accept if I want to use Omnisend, with that said though once the domain has been set up the success rate is great in reaching our customers inboxes. I would also just like the ability to be able to make it easier to target customers based on their order number - this can be done in a "work around" fashion, but just an easier way to implement this would be great.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Definitely use their free trial to get set up and to give it a try - I would note however that you will need to spend some time customising the templates to get the one you want but it is well worth it!

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
The ability to be able to simply contact certain customers based on certain requirements we have has helped us to provide a much better customer service.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use better than Mailchimp
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I love the automation feature that allows you to send multiple preset emails to customers. I also love the fact that you can import your subscriber list into Facebook automatically so that you can send them targetted ads. I love the analytics which allows me to clearly see how much revenue we made with an advertisement. It might seem like a big expense at first but when you see the value it brings you realize it is an investment

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I wish you had the option to send an email according to the customer time zone (mailchimp had this option). It would be nice to have a media gallery to be able to access the pictures that I've uploaded in Omnisend (without having to go and edit an email to see which pictures I have uploaded). It would be great to have custom CSS for templates.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
It is very easy to use, you can create nice looking emails in only a few minutes. I highly suggest to use their automation feature since it allows you to set a few emails and they are automatically sent to specific customers that you select. It really helps increasing sales!

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to retain customers by sending them an automated email when they browse our website but dont buy. We have definitely increased our sales since we started using Omnisend.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Marketing App for Shopify Hands Down
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
As someone who has been building websites for clients since the late 1990's, I have had the luxury of trying a ton of different email and connected marketing solutions apps for several clients, big and small, and the flexibility of Omnisend truly is an experience like no other.  This application is so easy to use and the help and tutorials along with their award winning customer service is outstanding.

Something else that you should be aware of is that when I go to present my solutions with Shopify, I always get the same question "Which email marketing platform do you recommend for Shopify?"  I have an excel spreadsheet that lays out 10 email marketing solutions side by side, and the one that is highlighted is Omnisend, because I know how amazing the company is and that they will carry through for each of my clients.  Hands down!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There is nothing I can honestly say I dislike.  Maybe sometimes support is faster than you want it to be, but that's great in all honesty!

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I recommend that everyone who utilizes Omnisend, go and take a look at the competition, write down the pros and cons, and then use Omnisend as well.  You will notice that all of the Cons are replaces with Pros using Omnisend.  I'd tell you to skip the competition, but then against you should never jump onto the first bid.  I recommend you give Omnisend a couple months.  If you run into problems, ask them.  They love helping and they will definitely do whatever it takes to help make you successful in your campaigns and marketing efforts.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I worked with another app that I constantly had to "monkey around" with when setting up clients on various platforms.  The ease of implementation working with Shopify has allowed my clients to save money by using this app for all of their email marketing and campaign based solutions.  They have really allowed my clients to see cost savings plus increased conversions.  That's the benefit.  Omnisend makes money by my clients, and my clients make money using their ultimate solution!

I like that is super easy to create a campaign as design one email, love the way it integrates with my Shopify store so I can grab my products and place it in the mail. Also, you can segment your audience to broadcast to the right people.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I think its form' design-builder lacks options to make uniques opt-in popups and the email design builder lacks of modules and options to create unique email designs. Think about this for a moment as we know this is a game-changer nowadays.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
There are other email marketing options to consider.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'll say the best is the price $9/mo is a super deal for this amazing product. We get better integration with our store platform without having any issue even when we integrate the in-built form opt-in from the theme we are using. Talking about email marketing we get major open rates from the first days and better marketing automation, it also increased our sales by 22% and still increasing! The best part is that it is easy to use and when we need to instruct a new member of the team they catch it before a week ends.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to work with, powerful email networking program
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend was an easy switch from the 'chimp after issues with Shopify. Integrates beautifully with no extra work from me, there are tons of videos and walk throughs which are easy to learn from and pretty straight to the point. I am able to whip up a good looking email newsletter quickly and the process is very intuitive. I love the shop item integration, allowing me to feature items from my shop by shopping my site direct from the newsletter design area.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Cost is a bit higher than I was previously working with however, it's close and seems reasonable for the options offered.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Look into it now and watch the training videos. It's a great upgrade and worth your time - the learning curve is not bad and the back end is fantastic.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
The ability to send a high quality email quickly and see the results is standard but as every second counts, Omnisend makes it just a bit easier. Little advantages are big.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
very easy to use features, easy to edit and build campaigns to suit my brand. I have no coding experience so i find omnisend very easy to navigate. It was easy to switch from mailchimps as well, which was something i worried about when switching over. but i feel as though i definitely made the right decision switching as omnisend offers a lot more interactive features for me and my customers. I was also pleasantly surprised at how quick it was to get it all set up. the billing is fairly straightforward as well and i was lucky enough to get a discount offer when switching over from mailchimp. overall i would definitely recommend omnisend to other small businesses looking to set up a newsletter.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
the prices seem a bit high considering that i don't send many emails. i wish there was an option for people with 4000+ signups that post infrequently. i don't have the time or inclination to send out more campaigns so i don't feel as though i really get my money's worth for the price.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
it's an excellent alternative to platforms like mailchimp, i switched and found it very easy to use.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
boosting email campaigns has been very useful, i also like the spin to win feature and scratch card feature. good analytics and campaign info, easy to check on sales from campaigns and good shopify integration.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy, Effective, and Affordable Email Service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
In the past, I was using another well-known email service because a few of the podcasts that I listen to had recommended it. It was expensive and I was never able to get the tracking successfully installed on my website despite multiple requests for help. After reading reviews on the Shopify app store, I decided to try Omnisend and I'm glad that I did! It's easy to set up and offers just as much as any of the competitors and I pay less each month now. Their support is also really helpful!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The only thing that I can think of that I would change is to show the actual products in the email builder instead of a blank product template. I can't remember if it's all of the product blocks or just a few (like bestsellers, for example), but overall it's not a big deal because it does send out correctly to the recipients.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Just give it a try! It's easy to set up and their support is really helpful. I'm also paying less than I was with another company for all of the same services (that actually work this time).

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend is helping me connect more with my email list. The welcome series, abandoned browse/abandoned cart, and general newsletter campaigns have been the most helpful and effective for me.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like that I can combine SMS and Video content into my workflows.  No platform has it all but Omnisend comes the closest to "having it all"   Omnisend allowed me to close both my Mail Chimp account and my Campaign Monitor account.  Now I spend less money, time and have more features to choose from one software system.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The Main thing would be a referral email.  It would be great to have a pre formatted email that lets you offer a discount when you have a referral make a purchase.   Campaign Monitor has this feature and it works tremendously.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Not every system has everything, but Omnesend comes about as close as possible.  With the combination of SMS, Video and many options with Facebook audiences they are surely headed in the right direction.  I can only presume they will continue to add more features as time moves on.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I like being able to add video to my automation emails, and additionally I like to place SMS reminders for expiring coupons too.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I love that Omnisend integrates so well with my Shopify store. I have only recently started to use Omnisend, but I have found it very simple and intuitive to learn. It is easy to run promotions, add discount codes, add products directly from my catalogue etc.  I also really like that Omnisend give so many options to customise the designs of the email templates.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Occasionally I have had problems with the Omnisend platform freezing whilst I'm in the middle of a design. I have given feedback on this and the support staff helped me to figure out why it was doing this and now I don't have any issues with it at all.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Give it a go! You won't regret it.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
The greatest benefit to using Omnisend is in time-saving. Previously (when using another platform), setting up promotions for email marketing was a very slow and tedious job. It is now much quicker so I can get on with other important aspects of my job.

The reports are amazing, I love the click map and being able to see exactly which parts of my campaign were clicked on.  Overall it has been a very seamless transition from Mailchimp over to Omnisend.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Not super intuitive,  I wish I was able to connect my multiple shopify stores instead of manually migrating people over, and I cant use my own google analytics tracking codes. Also the fonts and templates available aren't that great.

all_reviews.review_title: Pendo is a useful tool to manage multiple properties with excellent resource for owners.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like how easy to use and integrate. It has amazing templates that I can customize. Also, pop-ups are great because they look amazing from the start. Everything is pre-loaded, so if you don't like to look at a blank screen, you can adapt the wording and it's there.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The only feature that I don't like is that if you need great technical support, it will take you one day to respond and that can be stressful if you need them as soon as possible.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you sell products online, Omnisend will make all your work easier, but one of the most important things is that, you will get more recurring customers and repeat business using this product, I highly recommend it.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use Omnisend to automate emails and communications from our store. It is very easy to use and effective in setting up automatic emails for order tracking, customer re-activation, reviews. I would consider it essential for anyone selling online.

all_reviews.review_title: I resisted email marketing until Omnisend made it too easy to ignore anymore
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I appreciate the simplicity of the program. I don't have to spend hours setting anything up. It was smooth and quick to begin which is the only reason I did begin.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There's ONE feature that I don't have available to me (yet). I love that I can build landing pages in minutes but the automation email feature will only trigger if its a new email address so I have to manually send an email out to current subscribers that opted in to the landing page to receive a new PDF or special info.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have grown the majority of my business on social media ignoring email marketing for a long time simply because I didn't want to slow down and set things up. I didn't want to have to learn a new complex system when I was doing great on social. Omnisend now allows me to do both, easily. The system was too easy to set up and launch asap. I'm now using email and having FUN doing it.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like the ease of use of Omnisend.  It is very user-friendly and quick to integrate. I like that they offer a variety of fun integrations for emails such as the gift box and scratch box. I also love the wheel of fortune for collecting emails from our website visitors.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I would love if they had the ability to use merge tags (similar to MailChimp) for the integration of information into emails. I would also love to have an RSS automated email for blog posts. I also liked in MailChimp that you were able to tag groups of customers without having to create whole separate lists.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Omnisend is a great alternative to Mailchimp. They offer a variety of the same services and are easy to integrate into your website.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am solving the problems of communicating with our valued customers on our website. Omnisend makes it easy to design emails and the ability to stay connected to our customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Solid multi channel Solution for E Commerce
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I really like how deep it integrates with Shopify, so it becomes an extension of our online store. They are focussing on making automations and email creation very simple and user friendly, so for us this was the winner after testing a few different solutions. The Live view is a very nice feature as well that helps see a customer journey over time, how offten visited someone the store before purchase etc.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I don't really like the pricing when it comes to the plans that include other channels than email. I think it isn't reasonable so we're hoping for them to either change or find a different solution. Talking for a small start-up. Some building functionalities need time getting used to / make no sense. The subscription pop ups are not really so great sadly, very limited and difficult to optimise, also embedding sign up forms isn't possible sadly, which I really don't understand.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you're starting with email marketing in e commerce: this is great. There are other use cases where we use different mail systems but the integration into your online store is great here.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email automations and the integration of automatically created individual promo codes are really helping a lot. Also monitoring traffic and understanding user journeys better. You can set up basic campaigns literally in minutes - so if you're in a hurry you can still get something proper out to your customers.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to Understand and Use Email Marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The ease of choosing images from our online store. The template we use from Omni Send allows us to choose images 'on the fly' and keep producing a nice looking email start to finish.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
We would love to see a few more color and textures in the template options - thus making it even quicker to get our emails out in a timely manner. It would be nice to have a 'check' list to be sure we are not getting listed as spam.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Give Ominisend a try - we have used three other email marketing platforms and have found Omnisend to be a better value and much easier to use.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am able to compile and send emails easily, usually without any undo stress. It's also been easy to choose to highlight single items with just a click to add items and a few words.
We have made sales from each email we have sent and have gotten nice feedback from our customers as to the overall appearance of our emails

Problems with welcome automation and abandoned cart emails that we had previously don't exist anymore and we have realised that the people respond more to automation emails.

all_reviews.review_title: Used Omnisend for years.  Love it!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like that it's so quick and easy to design and send an email. I run an ecommerce store and I can send out an email to my customers within a couple minutes!  It seems like most of my emails are getting through as well.  They don't go to spam - like it seems they always did when I use other autoresponders.

The email templates look good and are easy to modify.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Not really much to say here... I've used Aweber and Mailchimp.  Omnisend is much more intuitive and easy to use.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If anyone asks me about what autoresponder to use, I always recommend Omnisend.  It's easy to use.  It's easy to navigate and send emails.  Even though I'm just using the emails... they have a lot of built in marketing tools that will help any ecommcerce store.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm making sales on my ecommerce store!  It's easy to send out emails and keep my customers engaged.  They have a lot of other tools I can use, but I just haven't gotten around to it yet.  But, if they are as easy as the email, I'm sure they are very valuable.

The email templates look good and are easy to modify.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I'd like more synchronicity with Shopify in that I'd like when tags are taken of in Shopify for those tags to be taken off in Omnisend - I'm having to manually remove tags and ensure customers appear in the right segments.

I'd also like tags to be more of a feature (this was a really useful aspect to the Mailchimp service and transformed my ability to organise segments and automations).

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Definitely give it a trial - it's easy to learn and navigate.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I really like the User Experience of Omnisend. For those who are beginners, they wouldn't find big problems to handle with the plataform and all the features that the offer.

I also like the integrations that they offer. The better one is with shopify, it is very easy to connect both and there are lots of possibilities.

The personalizations is good, there are some options. Recovery cart  and others email triggers is very simple and worth the price.

Also, the improvements that they are doing, give us more hope that the tool will be better every day.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The reports isn't very good, there isn't, for exemple, clicks per link in the automation emails .

Also, the subscribers manager is not good. The segmentation options is good but it is difficult to create lists and handle with different lists.

The price for the premium signature is, in my opinion, a little expensive.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you have an small or medium ecom and use shopify or another plataform that have integration, omnisend is better than most of others email plataforms.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
For my ecommerce Omnisend is very good. The integration with shopify and others plataforms make the work very easy in general.

It helps me in every touch point with my clientes. The email capturing, welcome emails, recovery browse or carts, order confirmation, shipping.

And of course, with the right strategy, increase my return rate of the store.

all_reviews.review_title: Best Mail Client We Have Used
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
We went from Mailchimp to Omnisend because of the shopify changes. We love the integration forms that go onto shopify. They are easy to set up and personalize. We really like that you can save your footer and social URLs so that way we don't have to reenter them every time we make an email. We love the reports, they let us see exactly what is happening with our emails.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The integration to shopify is a little tricky. The instructions are good, but one of the instruction points isn't 100% clear about what you change within the HTML coding because where it tells you to change the coding has two spots. The first time I set it up I put it after the wrong one.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am solving the accessibility to joining the newsletter. Before people would have a hard time finding where to sign up, but now its in the footer and a popup that stays on the bottom the screen. The benefits really are what I listed in the things I liked best. Omnisend has really helped us be more efficient.

all_reviews.review_title: Amazing app that has given great visibility to what happens in our store
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Live view is a really helpful tool and you can see who is looking (or looked) at what at any time. The marketing and newsletter tool is very easy to use and its great that you can create segments of different targeted groups with easy drop down menu's when setting up. The support team respond quickly to any queries and have been great at resolving any issues we faced (user error only!) Its a great tool for keeping track of new subscribers to your website. There is a function to automatically send these clients a welcome letter and always great to welcome them with the offer of a discount on their first purchase. There really are whole load of methods to encourage browsers to make purchases through your site and can mostly be set up to do this in an automated fashion. We have found that we spend a lot more time analysing our data and the visits to our store now that all of the infomation comes in a  very detailed d and easy to understand package.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
There is nothing not to like about this project and with regular updates its constantly evolving and improving.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Works superbly with Shopify. Simple and effective interface

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We now have a simple one stop shop to manage our marketing and newsletters from. We can easily view who, when and what has been looked at on our site. This means we can easily retarget registered users to try and encourage them to make purchases

all_reviews.review_title: Useful software to create campaigns through email
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
You simply need to drag mails inside the application so that they are stored inside the system. That speeds up the copying of emails within the application, since you do not need to waste time copying one by one manually.

The templates available for campaigns are visually attractive and also have a striking structure for the user.

Send newsletters or responses to users does not require much effort, you can create and send responses almost automatically without losing quality in the attention you are giving to the client.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I would add more integrations with other applications in the future so that you could have more options to make campaigns even more complete with the union of several applications within the same system.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I recommend Omnisend if you need a program that is simple to use and that at the same time allows you to add lists of clients, emails and create professional campaigns without having to have extensive knowledge.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We now have customer lists and emails stored within Omnisend. In addition, every time we want to add new users we do not waste time filling out eternal forms, it is done by simply moving the email within the application.

When we create marketing campaigns, we use the Omnisend templates and remain professional, which helps customers to see emails as attractive and generate greater profitability in our company, as they usually review them and click to get more information about this product and also about our company.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
We've tried several solutions ever since Mailchimp stopped working with Shopify and this has by far been our favorite. The ability to easily manage emails and templates is unrivaled. The setup process is straightforward and tells you exactly what you're paying for. It doesn't include a bunch of options you won't use and still charge you for them. Instead, you have the option to add on features as you grow your business which is perfect for many.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
To be honest, there really isn't much we've ran across that we don't like yet. If anything I'd suggest a couple new widgets in the email templates such as adding a whole product collection rather than specific products. The only other dislike is they don't have the ability to import existing push notification subscribers, therefore, you would have to start from scratch. However, I'm told by support that will be changing soon.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Definitely try the free trial. I believe you will quickly realize it's the best solution available.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Ideally, we'd like all of our customer communication to run through Omnisend. Email marketing, abandoned cart emails, thank you emails, etc are already helping us. We look forward to integrating Facebook chat, push notifications and more.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The preset styles and modules are simple and provide everything we would need to make a minimalistic, yet stylish email. We do not have the budget to use all of the features like SMS, but we are very satisfied with the current options. In researching transition options from Mailchimp, Omnisend had good documentation, and so it was a no-brainer.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I am being very detailed about what I believe can be improved, but for the price point the product is satisfactory.

The product picker is not as intuitive (so it took me a little to learn). It lags at times and sometimes I don't pick correctly and must start the entire module over.

Having used more advanced types of marketing automation (Hubspot, Salesforce, Act-on), I find that the segmentation and ability to manage the database is lacking. At this time my company does not need these as we only send out 3-4 emails a month, but as we grow it would be good to get these features.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We need an intuitive email service provider that allows us to build good looking emails fast. We also need an ESP that has strong integration with Shopify and will allow us to leverage that connection to send relevant emails.

all_reviews.review_title: Really good for integrating with shopify
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
It makes integrating with Shopify a breeze. The live mode is really good for tracking behaviors for our end consumers and every data helps. The automated features like retargeting and abandoned cart seems to be of big help as well. The layout is also very clean and appealing.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The only thing that I dislike about it was that compared to mailchimp. There isn't a time warp option where you can send the email in the same time in different time zones. Like if I schedule an email at 6pm next day, It would just send it at 6pm in your time zone. So an email sent at 6 oclock here in California will be received in a different time in New York and that could pose as a small setback.

all_reviews.review_title: Developer friendly but lacking enterprise options.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
- Support seems to resolve what I considered bigger issues very quickly. These issues required development work on their side and they were quick to provide solutions.
- The APIs are very easy to use and developer friendly.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
- There are no APIs around automation/workflows. Since someone could disable a workflow we have no idea that our automated emails are not being sent even though we are correctly using the custom event triggers.
- There is no logging of changes done in the workflows.
- To edit an email in a workflow you have to disable the email completely to even be in edit mode.
- If you put invalid html in an email template you can save it and make the template uneditable.
- There is no revision history/tracking for email templates. You can't quickly roll back to a previous edit.
- 400 custom events per minute limitation. Our automated emails go out in big batches which can take a while to process because of this limitation.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Realize that there are certain limitations that can be hard to work around. The platform is easy to use but lacks certain controls that make this a true player in an enterprise setting.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
As a developer it has made my life a lot easier to manage email delivery. Our content managers have the ability to customize emails by just knowing a little bit about html, but for those that do they can create very nice emails.

I love how little time it takes me to create a new newsletter. I can literally build one in under five minutes, based on the templates that I already have, and it's a breeze to put any of my shopify products right into my newsletter.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
i don't know how omnisend integrates with other products than shopify personally, so if you are not using shopify, you may have to do some extra research.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
i've built up quite a good mailing list which is now my main marketing channel. I needed something that integrated well with Shopify and Omnisend did the trick, having access to all my shopify data, and gatering new data through the landing pages and popup boxes integrated in my webpage.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use with great features
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I love the ease of use when creating email campaigns; everything from creating a template to scheduling and segmenting lists, it's all very intuitive. I have seen much more accurate reporting with the open rates and click rates for each campaign.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The overall organization of the campaigns and templates is a little more difficult to get used to if you've used other email platforms prior to using Omnisend.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
It's very easy to transfer data and customer information into the platform which makes trying it out less of a risk.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automation with new customers or interested customers has been super helpful. My favorite benefit is the resend campaign option (booster) that makes your emails go further and allows you to try again to reach the same audiences without creating more work. Essentially it makes your work go further.

Nothing yet, so far so good as we're still learning how to best implement everything.

We're using Omnisend for email marketing purposes. As a startup this is hugely important, while we haven't realized any profits, it is because we're brand new and just starting out.

all_reviews.review_title: Useful for higher level e-commerce email marketing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Helpful staff that are able to answer my questions around the clock. Pricing is pretty competitive with respect to how many features are available. Also many email automation triggers are available that other email marketing services don't provide. I especially like the automations that trigger when customer enters a segment.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Unable to reference the same discount code that was sent earlier to a customer again later on in the same automation (Conversio and Klaviyo can do this). So for Omnisend to get on the next level, something simple like that should be implemented. Especially when discount codes are important for e-commerce marketing. And when you have automations sending customers reminder emails in the last 24-48 hours of a discount coupon campaign.
Also needs more ways to set up entry triggers or let certain automation emails be skipped for customers who have received certain automation emails. Right now, you can filter by which campaigns (email blast) a client has been sent. But you cannot filter out emails by what automation emails were sent. This would make my life easier.

Would also like if omnisend could set up segments for VIP customers, at-risk customers etc, like other EMS services do.

And would like if Omnisend had the ability to show more data in an easier to view way. IE. how many new emails did we collect each day? How many came from which form? Right now, I can only see total number of emails sent in an automation. That isn't very helpful when you have anywhere from 3-10 emails in an automation......

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
A good alternative to Klaviyo if you're on a budget. Omnisend still has limitations, but has alot of features many other ecommerce email marketing services don't have.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I'm able to set up many email automations on my own, and set up complex triggers that I couldn't with other email marketing services. Especially like being able to send out customer Receipts as an automation!

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Omnisend?
review_question_answers.answer: Helpful staff that are able to answer my questions around the clock. Pricing is pretty competitive with respect to how many features are available. Also many email automation triggers are available that other email marketing services don't provide. I especially like the automations that trigger when customer enters a segment.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Omnisend?
review_question_answers.answer:
Unable to reference the same discount code that was sent earlier to a customer again later on in the same automation (Conversio and Klaviyo can do this). So for Omnisend to get on the next level, something simple like that should be implemented. Especially when discount codes are important for e-commerce marketing. And when you have automations sending customers reminder emails in the last 24-48 hours of a discount coupon campaign.
Also needs more ways to set up entry triggers or let certain automation emails be skipped for customers who have received certain automation emails. Right now, you can filter by which campaigns (email blast) a client has been sent. But you cannot filter out emails by what automation emails were sent. This would make my life easier.

Would also like if omnisend could set up segments for VIP customers, at-risk customers etc, like other EMS services do.

And would like if Omnisend had the ability to show more data in an easier to view way. IE. how many new emails did we collect each day? How many came from which form? Right now, I can only see total number of emails sent in an automation. That isn't very helpful when you have anywhere from 3-10 emails in an automation......

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
review_question_answers.answer: A good alternative to Klaviyo if you're on a budget. Omnisend still has limitations, but has alot of features many other ecommerce email marketing services don't have.

all_reviews.review_title: It's OK. Lacks some important features
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I like that it is fairly easy to use and the reporting is decent enough.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Lack of control for some design aspects that makes you find work arounds.
No separate styling for mobile.
Can not create additional lists, only segments and tagging.
Can not run report on products sold.
Pricing is based on list size, but also on number of emails sent per month. Other platforms price based on list size with unlimited number of sends.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Look for others that allow creation of lists not just segments and tagging. Also, find one that reports on products sold, not just aggregate sales figures.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Very simple and easy migration for my Shopify clients.

Automation is the key in today's business. So I was looking a tool that would allow me to do that and that would also give me some room to grow. As Omnisend is not just marketing automation but they have this omnichannel approach, I'm sure that I'll be able to start using other channels and integrating them into my marketing mix whenever I'm ready.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to use but little ROI
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I find your templates and features relatively user-friendly and that I can easily sync my products into my pre-saved templates or new campaigns.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
For the low innovation, conversion rate and ROI in the emails, the pricing is extremely high. I can use the same features in MailChimp for free for up to 2000 subscribers and they are constantly adding new features and allow you more creative freedom within their platform.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:

What do you like best about Omnisend?
This program is easy to use and its editor is very similar (if not based on) MailChimp. It's easy to get emails up and running, and the integration to Shopify presents powerful sales/ROI reporting.

Another fantastic aspect is the support team. They are very responsive and helpful.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I wish it had more font options. The editing features in general could be a bit more robust, but I think that they are working on that. The challenge is making the emails match the Shopify store branding.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're generating sales and engaging customers, turning would-be one-time customers into repeat purchasers.

all_reviews.review_title: Best marketing automation for ecommerce business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
It's all in one experience which means that you don't need to use many other tools for marketing your online store. Omnisend has not only regular newsletter campaigns, signup forms, segmentation option but also powerful automation that they keep on improving. I especially love their most recent order updates that allow you to send confirmation notifications.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Nothing so far - they keep adding new features every month so it's getting better and better.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Make sure you're using all Omnisend features, this way you can benefit the most as info about your customers is synced and in one place. I've started with forms but then added automated workflows like Welcome series and Cart Recovery and I see how this is giving my business way better results. So much better experience than confusing Mailchimp.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing automation is such a must for every online store so I'm happy I've found Omnisend which covers all my needs in this area. Even more, they say they gonna add even more channels in their automation workflows this year so it should be even more powerful. Can't wait!

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Our campaigns are performing better and better, so the value we get from Omnisend is increasing more each month. We compared the deliverability rate with other providers, and we were getting a better result from Omnisend. We'd been using MailChimp previously, but it was pulling teeth to get any kind of support, so we had to sift through forums to find information. Even when we were testing Omnisend with a free plan, we had 24/7 support. The design is really intuitive, and their templates were ready with just a few tweaks here and there.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The app looks a bit old-fashioned, but its both powerful and easy to use, which I think is more important.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I would definitely recommend Omnisend. It's really easy to use and it makes setting up complicated email flows really simple. There are tons of ways to target and segment your lists too. They also have customizable tags you can add to your subscribers, so you can really target based on anything that you want. I think it could work for a variety of business models, but you can tell it's made for ecommerce.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Omnisend let's us automate complex email flows for our customers. This means that none of our customers are falling through the cracks. We can send abandoned cart or welcome emails depending on where the customer triggers.

all_reviews.review_title: Highly recommend to use this tool for your business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
It is a professional platform that I would highly recommend to use. I really like its features, functionality and automation workflows. Previously, I used another platform, but this one is definitely the best! It is easy to navigate through the platform and learn how to use all features. They own a huge "knowledge base" which contains a lot of useful and updated information. When using automation workflow, you will notice that large part of manual work is done automatically. I strongly advice to use Omnisend, you won't regret it.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I would suggest to create some more templates. It would be a benefit for some businesses who do not have a graphic designer and want to distinguish from competitors.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Omnisend is a professional platform that I would recommend for both professionals and beginners. It helps you to save time, because automation workflows can "do" big job for you. It really helps to strengthen brand, create more sustainable communication with clients and also increase sales. Finally, price for this product is really fair and it is worth 100%.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Huge benefit is that you don't need to have many different apps or programs. Omnisend offers you all important tools for successful marketing in one place. Also, you can check your sales results in "live view", use many newsletters which create value for customers (like special discount coupons, gift boxes) or use other important tools while interacting with your visitors. All in all, there are much more benefits to try.

all_reviews.review_title: Better than anything else I've ever tried.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I have been working in the marketing field for not a very long time, I've tried a few tools however. For a few months I've tried Mailchimp like most, however, after those few months there was pretty much nothing else for me to discover or to do. However after that I tried out Omnisend, an acquaintance told me about it. And I have to say it was Fantastic. Every issue is solved fast with their support, they communicate via any channel  you try to reach out for them. And of course the best of all - features and the speed they present new ones. Omnisend is truly a versatile tool for any kind of user. Oh and they have spanish version!

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I really like having all my marketing channels in one, hope in the future something like that Omnisend will be able to provide.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Make your life easier with it really. You don't have to be a professional to look professional.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
I had issues with newsletter templates, I am not a very artistic or a coder for that matter. With Omnisend I can prep templates in an easy manner. It really is only a few clicks, dragging or color change, but the result is always very professional.

all_reviews.review_title: Who knew marketing can be this much fun?
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend is not my first email marketing application, I had a few before and after having a mediocre experience I started to look for something new and perfect - and I've found it - Omnisend. And now, Omnisend is taking a newer and better approach and going to marketing automation field which is fantastic.
Omnisend has a very fresh and great approach to marketing, they suggest new and interesting features that actually work, I appreciate to have this very amazing marketing tool a part of my business, I do feel it helps me and makes my campaigns much more successful.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
They could provide a longer trial in my opinion. Sometimes a month is not enough to experience all of their features simply.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you feel lost with your marketing and business go with Omnisend. With the help of their knowledge base, blog and other updates you will get the hang of marketing very very fast and very easy. Good luck

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
My main issue is this - how much do I bring and how much do I get and my own goal is to invest a lot less and get a lot more, and with Omnisend I feel like I actually managed that. I was able to get a whole variety of features (we're talking marketing automation - welcome, birthday, cart reminder emails, we have segmentation, we have A/B testing, we even have SMS!) for a very little investment. I think the starting price is somewhat 8 or 12 dollars. It depends on what you need and your contact base.

all_reviews.review_title: Behavioral triggered emails increased my ROI
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
After some ecommerce marketing courses, I understood that instead of focusing on customer acquisition , I need to spend more time by trying to increase conversion rate in my e-shop. I tested 7 different email providers and I picked Omnisend. They support team even helped even with some strategies for automation workflows. I recommend for all ecommerce business owners to start using Browse and Product abandonment functions. I increased my ROI by 11 % in two months.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
The possibility to copy-paste created automation workflows will save time.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Just get free trial and test all prepared automation workflows. This can bring for you ideas how you can better communicate with your visitors.

Previously my all emails were the same for everyone. I have different communication approach based by visitors behavior today.

all_reviews.review_title: Have been using this software for over a year now & very very happy
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
#omnisend is awesome! I have been a customer now for over a year & been very happy. I shopped around a lot and tried out several different platforms, but honestly have found Omnisend the most user friendly, cost effective maketing software which takes care of all your online marketing.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
To be honest, there isnt any issues with this platform that I can report on. Any issues we have had, the support you get day or night from Omnisend is second to none. They work quickly to fix any issues & ensure you are 100% happy once its fixed.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I would recommend trialling the product, as you wont be disappointed , its so easy to use & integrate into your site. You wont need any other email makerting software. This software is cost effective and fantastic to use.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have used Omnisend for our email marketing, its amazingly easy to use and quick to get a grasp of. I use shopify & it links in with my site & you can select products from there, which is one of its best features (as all other platforms I looked at you had to manually upload all products and links), I use it to collect email addresses on our website, and for re-targetting / abandon cart emails, which are super effective.

all_reviews.review_title: Finally - An Email Platform That Fulfills All Your Needs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I've been using Omnisend for the past six months and and all I have is praises. I've been looking for a marketing platform that would have it all. And they do!
Automation, signup forms, reports, popups, newsletters, boosting features... And you don't need additional platforms for such features as wheel of fortune for example. Also major props - fantastic support, they are easy to reach and very helpful.
Omnisend just has this very youthful and smart view when it comes to business and their own platform. They are always looking for ways to improve, listens to customer complaints and comes up with new and awesome features in short periods of time.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Not much to dislike really, only maybe I'd like their upcoming features to be live NOW, just because I can't wait that long haha.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Try it out for free. They have that option, in that period try out as many features as you can. I bet you will love the tool instantly. Also the price is great for what they offer, plus they do discounts from time to time, you just have to look for them.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mostly with other tools I always was missing some kind of feature that was essential to me. Maybe their automation workflows we're poor, maybe they didn't provide quality report tools, maybe their support was non-existent. With Omnisend I have no troubles yet.

all_reviews.review_title: Advanced email marketing automation can be really simple!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
The automation workflows were already pre-filled (saved us a lot of time) and our dedicated Account Manager Larry helped us to start with really good email marketing strategies and flows immediately. Larry advised us how we can increase our conversation rate and grow our email lists with Omnisend features

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Since we ordered the PRO plan and got an account manager, it probably would've taken a lot of time to do it all without him--I mean, all the setup and testing. We probably would've needed more time to figure out how all the features should be used.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Omnisend has a free trial with all the features we're using right now on the Pro plan. Just test it out and you'll see what a good fit Omnisend is. Their pre-filled automation workflows are a real time-saver, which is a really good place to start.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We didn't need to get a bunch of different apps and therefore didn't need any custom solutions for different popups or contact forms. We got all these features with Omnisend. We're also able to test our ideas without developing custom flows.

all_reviews.review_title: A/B testing email campaigns increased our sales by 60%
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
What is great that we can simply A/B test every email campaign that we're focusing on. By testing various subject lines, content, images & even automation flows we were able to increase our sales by 60% at the final steps. We needed to send out lot's of different email automation campaigns to reach significant amount of audience to prove our tests, therefore the deliverability rates were really good and much better compared to other tools. Great service from customer support whenever it's needed.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Revenue dashboard is great to see the final sales, however would be interesting to see how many users are starting checkout, but do not finish it.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
If you are looking for sales ready email automation tool, Omnisend is the right one.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Personalizing our shopping experience according the customers needs. Selling different products based on their previous interest. What's most important all features are developed to generate more sales.

all_reviews.review_title: Glad we choose this platform for our clothing shop
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
We started to use Omnisend more than a year ago (Mailchimp I have used almost 4 years). As we are developing strong brand in clothing niche, we really needed to focus more on increasing sales with our existant big customer base. At Omnisend we found a wide range of templates, so I can prepare everything quite fast and be sure right person will get the message at the right time. And I liked sign up forms a lot, it helped me to get more subscribers and segment them. Now it is possible to deliver them targeted messages.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
A bigger gallery for the templates to use. Even though there are enough to get start fast and quickly. We would appreciate a bigger amount of templates.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I have very good experience with Omnisend that's why I can recommend them as smart system to manage your emails for visitors.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of my problem was segmentation. Now it's easy to split my contacts into subscribers , shoppers and buyers and to get in touch with them in right way. During short term I have noticed that their special feature Cart recovery works quite well. Previously I didn't have possibility to reach my estore shoppers after their leave and offer them to finish purchase.

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend is a premium triple-A E-mail service. It pays for itself tenfold.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend offers the ability to effortlessly create e-mail list segments based on factors such as country, or how many orders the user has placed. This means I can better target my customers without an onslaught of manual data entry.

This is especially effective when creating tiered VIP lists or special offers to specific customers. I also send different e-mails to different countries as marketing needs to be as tailored as possible. Especially useful when offering a seamless experience via price, shipping times etc.

www.norseblood.com

#omnisend


What do you dislike about Omnisend?
Cannot preview e-mails for different devices meaning the default preview isn't always accurate.


www.norseblood.com

#omnisend

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
A free service is great until you want to be serious about your business.

If your business doesn't want to be considered a hobby, Omnisend is the way to go.

Customer segmentation

Bulk e-mails

Importing/exporting e-mails & effective paper trail creation

After CRO expert analysis we searched for a marketing tool which can help us to get more from ours e-shop visitors. We got recommendations for  Klaviyo, Dotmailer, and Omnised. We chose Omnisend. Functionalities on these tools are pretty the same, but Omnisend support team showed that we are important for them.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
We felt that we are not using most efficiently the tool and we can get more from it. But after a couple months of testing different automation workflows, we understood what works of us the best.

Smart assistant for your email marketing automation

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Previously we were oriented to increase traffic, but now with automation workflows, we give more attention to converting visitors to customers. Cart recovery function is our favorite.

all_reviews.review_title: All-in-one email marketing with a lot of features
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I'd definitely have to say that the fact that it has great email marketing automation (and segmentation) PLUS popups, landing pages, cart abandonment, etc., is really amazing. We stopped using a lot of other apps just because Omnisend had a lot of what we needed already.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I was a bit confused with the onboarding (some things weren't clear about the automated discount code), but we contacted support and they answered in less than 5 minutes (much better than Mailchimp's).

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
It was easier for us to collect subscribers for our email campaigns, and of course to send them out as well. The automation workflows were really great, especially when we got tips from support and just going through their blog. In fact, really optimizing our automation workflows was crucial, since before then we'd relied heavily on just manual newsletter campaigns.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
How easy it is to get started. Compared to the rest of platforms I've tried, you really need to "learn" the interface and the whole set up process to get something out. Not with Omnisend. Newsletter templates and automation workflows come out-of-box, which helps to start in minutes. At the same time, Omnisend is powerful enough to customize email content in any way you want, so the platform feels balanced for speed and customization.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
More newsletter templates would be nice to have, yet no major complains.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
I would highly recommend Omnisend to any ecommerce business. One of the best email marketing platforms in terms of cost/benefit.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest advantage Omnisend gives to my business is the ability to manage everything in one unified platform. I finally feel like I don't need to use multiple platforms to manage subscribers, customers and newsletters, as Omnisend handles all the marketing pretty well.

all_reviews.review_title: Omnisend is the best marketing automation platform I ever worked with
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Omnisend is an amazing ecommerce marketing automation platform. With this tool I was able to boost my sales, help my business grow, increase my subscriber userbase.
Omnisend has amazing automation workflows that makes manual work easier than ever. You can send out welcome emails, thank you emails, birthday emails and of course the best ones are cart recovery emails. They helped me gain extra 15% of sales. Also, Omnisend is very easy to navigate trough, the dashboard is simplistic, UI is comfortable and you don't need any extra coding knowledge to work with their provided email templates. Omnisend 10/10 will continue to work with it.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I don't dislike anything particular or of an importance. Had some questions that we're disputed very fast with the help of their support team.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Omnisend is a fantastic ecommerce marketing automation platform for those who are simply have no time for manual work and want sophisticated automation workflows. With Omnisend it is very easy to do. The platform is comfortable to navigate trough, dashboard is excellent, support is helpful, friendly and fast and of course their other features like newsletter editor or product picker are to die for. Made my life so much easier.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
My main problem was that I wanted to increase my sales, as well as, brink visitors back. When it comes to sales a big part of website traffic leaves without making a purchase. I was looking for a professional and sophisticated automation platform that would help me solve this issue. And with the easy Omnisend integration I was able to do that I a very short period of time.
Now my work is easy, fast, simple to do and generates me higher revenue than before.

all_reviews.review_title: Best eCommerce email platform for small biz
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
Easy to use, has all the bells and whistles I could want. Automatic marketing flows, timed pop ups, beautifully designed and customizable forms, straight forward reporting, easy importing of addresses. It's all here for the same price as the other guys, and way more user friendly. Built specifically for eCommerce. I've used MailChimp & Campaign Monitor and this is by far my favorites. Free trial up to 15k emails a month or max 2k a day, after that it's $10 a month.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
That I didn't find it sooner and that more people aren't talking about it. I swear I don't work for them, I just really appreciate this platform.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
This is an amazing eCommerce email platform. I can't believe all it does for $10 a month.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
Building our mailing list, sending out coupon codes for signing up, automatic cart abandonment emails, marketing campaign emails, newsletter, entry, exit & timed sign up pop ups.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
It is priced the exact same as Mailchimp but is a much better platform. We use it as an app through Bigcommerce which syncs with our customer list instantly. The email templates are easier to design, and the product picker allows you to select products on my site and it automatically pulls in the image, product name, product description and price. The campaign reports also show how much revenue we made from them.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I cannot crop an image directly within the app- I must photoshop in a separate app.

Recommendations to others considering Omnisend:
Definitely take advantage of the free trial! Working within bigcommerce I needed to add code into the backend templates so if that isn't something you're familiar with it may take longer for implementation.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
This saves us so much time in creating emails, especially with the product picker, and we are seeing sales from that email right in the report.

all_reviews.review_title: Nice personalised template and very good customer service :)
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Omnisend?
I am extremely satisfied with the custom template that Soundest has built for medigo.com It looks exactly the way we wanted it to look. It was a pleasure to deal with their customer service as they were always able to provide me with a helpful reply within 30 mins.

What do you dislike about Omnisend?
I am sure they will be able to make some improvements over time. I would prefer to be able to add my own URL parameters instead of auto-tagging. Also, it would be good to be able to get more in-depth insights into the email performance from the report, e.g. a 24 hr performance of the newsletter to see how many people clicked/opened when, as well as the top locations by opens. But I like the click map that shows where people clicked in the newsletter.

What problems is Omnisend solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are sending out newsletters with Soundest.
